He left Nampula for Maputo on a study mission. He has been an administrator at José Macamo EP1 School and a community leader for over three years. He earns a salary of 8.000mt a month. He uses it to pay for home expenses and saves part of it in his bank account.
He has never had loans in other banks. He first heard of Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of this institution. This is his third loan with Hluvuku. It is for 10.000mt, which he intends to use to purchase construction supplies in order to continue building his house (cinder blocks, sand, rafters, iron, cement, etc.). The other loans were for 6.000mt and 20.000mt, for personal housing.
He pledges to repay as scheduled. In the future he intends to finish building his house and to invest in his education. For that purpose he plans to request more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies in order to continue building his house (cinder blocks, sand, rafters, iron, cement, etc.).

loans.name: Savana Muungano Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Savana Muungano Group in Western Kenya! Melisa is the facilitator of the Savana Muungano group. This group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.

Melisa takes care of five children at home. She joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds and ensure food security for her family. In the recent 2011 season, Melisa had a good maize yield harvesting seven bags on 1/2 acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Melisa was only able to harvest two bags of maize on 1/2 acre of land.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Melisa and her group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

With income from her maize sales, Melisa will ensure food security and invest in livestock rearing.

In 2012, the members of Savana Muungano group will each plant between ½ and 1 acre of maize.

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Kisarawe Group

texts.en:
Basilia, who is in her mid-40s, is married and has four children — two of whom are going to school. She has been running a clothing business for four years now. She works from 10 AM to 2 PM and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be her third loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to pay school fees and home expenses, as well as to expand her clothing business. She has paid back all of her loans successfully. She wants a loan to increase her clothing stock. Her dream is to one day be able to buy a plot of land and to own a car.

She will share this loan with her loan group "Kisarawe," which has a total of 17 members who will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.

loans.use: to increase her clothing stock.

loans.name: Fatou

texts.fr: Madame Fatou habite dans une des cités voisines d’une  communauté  villageoises du Sénégal. Elle est âgée  de 49 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 6 enfants dont l’âge varie entre 12 et 27 ans. Elle a une expérience de plus de 20ans dans son activité de commerce qui consiste à vendre des légumes et de l’huile de palme. Auparavant elle s’activait dans le commerce du pain. Elle a démarré le commerce par le biais de sa mère qui le lui a recommandé. Elle est très intéressée  par l’aspect lucratif de son activité. Elle est sociétaire de l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis novembre 2000. Elle a déjà remboursé 5 prêts antérieurs. Elle sollicite un crédit de 400 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de légumes de d’huile de palme destinés a renforcer sa cantine en produits. L’accroissement de ses revenus lui permet d’améliorer la situation sociale de sa famille.
texts.en: Mrs. Fatou lives in a town neighboring a rural community in Senegal. She is 49 years old. She is married and the mother of six children between 12 and 27 years of age. She has over 20 years of experience  selling  vegetables and palm oil. Before she used to sell bread. She went into this business following the advice of her mother, who recommended it. She is very motivated by the profitability of this business. She has been a member of a branch of U-IMCEC since 2000. She has already repaid five prior loans. She is seeking a credit of 400,000 to buy vegetables and palm oil in order to expand her stock. The revenue increase will allow her to improve the socioeconomic conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and palm oil for resale

loans.name: Tuinuane Women Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Tuinuane Women Group in Western Kenya! Timothy is the facilitator of the group. This group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program. 

Timothy is a father of two children. He joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds and ensure food security for his family. In the recent 2011 season, Timothy had a good maize yield harvesting 14 bags on 3/4 acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, he was only able to harvest one bag of maize on 3/4 acre of land. With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Timothy and his group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

With income from his maize sales, Timothy will educate his children, ensure food security and invest in livestock rearing.

In 2012, the members of Tuinuane Women group will each plant between ½ and 1 acre of maize.

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

With income from her maize sales, Josephine will save for the future and repay her loans.

The photograph shows Josephine with her group members.

loans.name: Nafisa

texts.en:
Nafisa lives in Changamwe, Kenya and owns a salon business which has been in operation for one year. She is married and has three children, two of whom are in school. She is also employed elsewhere.
Nafisa learned of Milango from a friend and decided to join in order to access credit. She is applying for a loan of Ksh 100,000 to purchase cosmetics and salon machines e.g. blow dryer. 
Nafisa believes the income from this loan will improve the standard of living of her family while her future plans include opening other salon branches to increase sales.

loans.use: To purchase cosmetics and salon machines e.g. blow dryer

loans.name: Nver

texts.en:
Nver was born in 1961. He is married and has two sons. One of his sons is a student, and the older one is studying at a branch of Yerevan State University. Nver’s wife works in village administration as a librarian.

Nver is a specialist in agronomy, and he has been working in his specialization since 1985. At the same time, Nver is engaged in farming. On his farm he has cows and pigs, and he grows wheat, corn, and potatoes. However, his primary activity is grape-growing. Nver sells grapes to a wine factory.

Thanks to his occupations, Nver provides for his family and pays for his elder son’s education.

Nver is asking for a 500,000 AMD loan to buy potato seedlings, as well as rope and ties for his vineyard. This is Nver’s second loan from Nor Horizon.

Nver returns home from his wage work late in the evening, and Nor Horizon’s loan officer had to take his photo in the dark.

loans.use: to buy potato seedlings, as well as rope and ties for his vineyard.

loans.name: Cheta B Shg Group

texts.en:

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Abraham and his group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

Abraham takes care of two children at home. He joined One Acre Fund in order to grow enough food to ensure food security for his family and to access One Acre's best prices. In the recent 2011 season, Abraham had a very good maize yield harvesting 14 bags on one acre of land. Before joining One Ace Fund, Abraham was only able to harvest six bags of maize on one acre of land.

With income from his maize sales, Abraham will educate his children and save for future use.

In 2012, the members of Cheta B SHG group will each plant maize plots between ½ and 1 acre of land.

The photograph shows Abraham with his group members and the field officer (who is standing on the far left).

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Etaf

texts.en:
Etaf is 52 years old, married, and has four children. One of her sons is a worker with a decent salary, the other has a gift stall with a low income. Etaf wants to help her son to purchase more gift items so he has a better collection to sell thereby increasing his income. 

Etaf is requesting a loan for $1,500 from FATEN, which she will use to enable her son to purchase more gift items to sell. Etaf  will contribute positively to improve her son's living conditions. Etaf is a conservative woman, so her son  with the gift stall is in the photograph.

loans.use: to purchase gifts to sell.

loans.name: Adriana María

texts.es: La señora Adriana a sus 47 años de edad es madre de cinco hijos de 28, 26, 23, 16 y 11 años de edad, se dedica a la elaboración y venta de comida rápida desde hace cuatro meses, luego de tener problemas familiares, la señora Adriana tuvo que independizarse y dejar de trabajar con su hermana. Alterno a esta actividad, la señora Adriana se dedica a la venta de mercancía junto con su esposo, ellos venden en los pueblos cercanos al municipio de Amaga localizado al sur de Antioquia artículos como accesorios femeninos y masculinos como aretes, hebillas para el cabello y bisutería. La señora Adriana desea comprar materia prima para elaborar sus productos comestibles como harina, aceite y huevos y adicional a esto comprar surtido para la venta de mercancía en la cual la demanda aumenta gracias a la temporada de fin de año, con lo cual aumentaran sus ingresos y mejorará la calidad de vida de su familia e hijos. La señora Adriana sueña con tener su propio local de comidas y un almacén propio con su esposo.
texts.en:
Señora Adriana is 47 years old and has 5 children aged 28, 26, 23, 16 and 11 years. She has been making and selling fast food for the last 4 months. After some family problems, Señora Adriana had to become independent and stop working with her sister. In addition to this business, she sells merchandise with her husband. They sell items such as men's and women's accessories such as earrings, hair lotion and haberdashery in the towns near the municipality of Amaga, located to the south of Antioquia. Señora Adriana wants to buy raw materials such as flour, oil, eggs with which to make food and in addition buy stock for their sale of merchandise as demand grows with the end-of-year season; this will increase their income and improve their  family's quality of life. 

Señora Adriana dreams of having her own premises selling food and a store with her husband.

loans.use: to buy raw materials with which to make her products such as flour, eggs, oil and in addition buy merchandise to stock and sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: )to purchase working tools (bricks, cement, etc.)

loans.name: Jesukpego2 Group

texts.fr: Le groupe JESUKPEGO2 est composé de trois personnes qui sont des amies. C'est la sixième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante  du groupe, du nom de Pierrette est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Pierrette est âgée de 56 ans et vit au Bénin. Pierrette n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Pierrette ne vit plus avec son mari. Pierrette a cinq enfants tous scolarisés dont un reste encore à sa charge. Pour subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de son enfant à charge, Pierrette vend depuis trente ans, de la nourriture (riz et haricot) qu'elle prépare et qu'elle vend à la devanture de sa maison. Pierrette s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Pierrette sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe JESUKPEGO2, un sixième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les cinq premiers prêts ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: The JESUKPEGO2 group is composed of three friends. This is the sixth time the group has sought financial assistance from Alidé, in order to increase the scale of their business. The group representative, Pierrette, is the lady with her hand raised in the photo. Pierrette is 65 years old and lives in Benin. Pierrette did not go to school. Pierrette no longer lives with her husband. Pierrette has five children, all school educated, one of whom still lives at home. In order to meet her basic needs, and those of her child, for the last thirty years Pierrette has sold food (rice and beans) which she prepares and then sells from the front of her home. Pierrette buys her supplies at a market in Benin. With a view to satisfying her customers' wants and to increase her turnover and her income, Pierrette is seeking a sixth loan from Alidé together with the other members of the JESUKPEGO2 group. The five other loans have all been successfully repaid.

loans.use: to buy bags of rice, beans and sauce condiments

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
El socio es el Sr. Julio; El socio tiene  45 años de edad, el es conviviente, y tiene 3 hijos, el socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de artesania,el socio vende muñecas,tejidos,chompas entre otras artesanias y lo envia a lugares como Bolivia y tambien el socio se dedica al trabajo como seguridad en centro comercial desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio el socio saca adelante a sus hijos,el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de artesania y mejorar en su trabajo como seguridad . El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar artesania y comprar materiales como lana y palitos de tejer para que haga la artesania.

La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member is 45 year old Julio.  He has a life partner and three children.

He continues to devote himself to the handicrafts business.  He sells dolls, woven goods, and sweaters among other handicrafts.  He sends them to places like Bolivia.  He also works as a security guard in a commercial center from 8:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m.  Through this business he gets his children ahead.

He requested the loan to buy handicrafts and to buy materials like wool and knitting needles to make handicrafts.

He is grateful for and values the loan that was granted to him.  He pledges to make his payments on time.

loans.use: to buy handicrafts and to buy materials like wool and knitting needles to make handicrafts.

loans.name: Mukunduzi B Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Mukunduzi B Group in Western Kenya! Grace is the facilitator of the Mukunduzi B group. This group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.

Grace takes care of four children at home. She joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds and improve in the production rate to ensure food security for her family. In the recent 2011 season, Grace had an excellent maize yield harvesting 16 bags on one acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Grace was only able to harvest one bag of maize on one acre of land.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Grace and her group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

With income from her maize sales, Grace will educate her children and pay back her One Acre Fund loan.

In 2012, the members of Mukunduzi B group will each plant between ½ and 1 acre of maize.

The photograph shows Grace with her group members and the field officer who is standing on the far left.

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Malkia Group

texts.en:
Rose, who is in her late 30s, is married with four children who are still going to school. She has been running a vegetable business for one year now.  She works from 9 a.m. to 8 p.m. daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit. 

This will be her first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania, and she wants to use it to buy more vegetables to sell. Her dream is to one day be able to build her own house. 

She will share this loan with her loan group "Malkia," which has a total of 18 members who will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Sinsindagbe Group

texts.fr: Le groupe SINSINDAGBE est composé de trois membres qui résident dans la même zone. La représentante de ce groupe du nom de Raïmatou est celle qui a une main levée sur la photo. Dans le but de rehausser le niveau de leur activité afin de mieux faire face à la demande de leur clientèle, ce groupe sollicite pour une troisième fois, l'appui financier de ALIDé. Raïmatou est âgée de 37 ans et est mariée à un certain Rafiou. Le couple a deux enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Raïmatou n’a pas fréquenté l'école. Raïmatou vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les différentes charges de la maison. Depuis trois ans, Raïmatou vend des condiments dans son quartier, activité qu’elle exerce et qui lui procure des revenus non négligeables. Raïmatou s'approvisionne dans l’un des marchés du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer leur activité et de mieux satisfaire leur clientèle, Raïmatou et les autres membres du groupe SINSINDAGBE sollicitent un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
The SINSINDAGBE group is comprised of three members who live in the same area. The group representative, Raïmatou is the lady with her hand raised in the photo. With a view to increasing the scale of their business to better meet their customers' demand, this group is seeking financial assistance from Alidé for the third time. Raïmatou is 37 years old and is married to Rafiou. They have two children in school, and living at home. Raïmatou did not attend school. Raïmatou lives with her husband and children. The couple meet the household budget together. For three years, Raïmatou has sold condiments in her neighbourhood, a business which proves quite profitable for her.
Raïmatou buys her supplies in one of Benin's markets. With the goal of strengthening their business and better meeting the needs of their customers, Raïmatou and the other members of the SINSINDAGBE group are seeking a third loan with Alidé.

loans.use: to buy condiments

loans.name: Cinforosa

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Cinforosa; tiene 59 años de edad, y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de comida,ella prepara platos como pollo al horno,huevos fritos y caldos,la socia tiene un puesto en el mercado de Cusco donde prepara la comida,la socia trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de comida. La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar  como carne,huevo, pollo y verduras.

 La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Our associate is Cinforosa, she is 59, married and has three children; she continues to work in the business of food sales, she prepares dishes such as oven roasted chicken, fried eggs and soups, she has a stand in the Cusco market where she prepares the food and works from 7:00 AM to 6:00 PM, through this business she gets her children ahead and wants to expand and improve her food sales business. Our associate requests a loan to buy ingredients to cook with such as meat, eggs, chicken and vegetables.

Our associate is thankful for the loan and is committed to repay on schedule.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to cook with such as meat, eggs, chicken and vegetables

loans.name: Deysi Yant Giraldo Garcia

texts.es: La señora D. a sus 31 años de edad se dedica a la venta de ropa para niños y niñas en su propio almacén localizado en la sala de su casa ubicada en el municipio de Marinilla situado al oriente de Antioquia. Esta labor la realiza la señora D. desde hace diez años. Con el fin de atender la demanda por temporada de fin de año que se aproxima, la señora D. desea comprar surtido para su almacén de ropa infantil y de esta manera poder aumentar sus ventas e ingresos que le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia compuesta por su esposo y dos hijos de 8 y 3 años de edad. La señora D. sueña con tener otro punto de venta de ropa infantil.
texts.en: At 31 years of age, D. sells childrens clothes in her own shop based in the sitting room of her house.  She lives in Marinilla, to the east of Antioquia and has worked in this fashion for ten years. With a view to meeting client demand for the coming end of year season, D. wishes to buy stock for her childrens clothes shop.  This way she will be able to increase her sales and income which will allow her to improve the quality of life of her family - her husband and two children aged 8 and 3.  D. dreams of having a second childrens clothing retail outlet.

loans.use: to buy stock for a childrens clothes shop

loans.name: Gbenonkpo Group

texts.fr: Le groupe GBENONKPO est composé de trois membres qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante de ce groupe du nom de Denise est celle qui a une main levée sur la photo. Dans le but de rehausser le niveau de leur activité afin de mieux faire face à la demande de leur clientèle, ce groupe sollicite pour une deuxième fois, l'appui financier de ALIDé. Denise est âgée de 31ans et est mariée à un maçon du nom de Salomon. Le couple  a trois enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge.  Denise n’a pas fréquenté l'école.  Denise vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les différentes charges de la maison. Depuis une dizaine d’année, Denise vend de divers produits (conserves, pâtes alimentaires, laitues, légumes) à son domicile. Denise s'approvisionne dans l’un des marchés du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer leur activité et de mieux satisfaire leur clientèle, Denise et les autres membres du groupe GBENONKPO sollicitent un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé
texts.en: The GBENONKPO group is comprised of three members who live in the same area. Denise is the group representative, she has her hand raised in the photo. With a goal of increasing the size of their business in order to better meet the demand from their customers, this group is seeking a loan from ALIDé for a second time.  Denise is 31 years old and is married to a mason called Salomon. They have three children, school educated and living at home. Denise did not attend school. Denise lives with her husband and their children. The couple meet the household budget between them. For about ten years, Denise has sold various products from her home (conserves, pasta, lettuces, vegetables). Denise buys her supplies in one of Benin's markets. With the goal of strengthening their business and better satisfying their customers, Denise and the other members of the GBENONKPO group are seeking a second loan with ALIDé.

loans.use: to buy various products (conserves, vegetables and lettuces)

loans.name: Fernando David

texts.es:
Fernando David tiene 25 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con la madre en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.
La VRC LUCHANDO JUNTOS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Zapotal nuevo, Pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a Labores Comerciales en su mayoría. 

Fernando se dedica desde hace tres años  al servicio de taxis. La compra de la gasolina lo realiza en  Ventanas. 
Solicita el crédito para dedicarse a la agricultura y poder comprar un solar, con la ayuda del crédito le ayudará a obtener beneficios, El sueño es poderse comprar un carro, no se le han presentado ningún tipo de problema. 

En los tiempos libres le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en: Fernando David is 25, single and has no children.  He lives with his mother in the Cantón Ventanas Province of los Ríos. The VRC LUCHANDO JUNTOS organisation based in the Zapotal Nuevo area, part of Cantón Ventanas, is mostly dedicated to commercial projects.  Fernando has worked for three years within the taxi service and he buys gasoline in Ventanas.  He is asking for a loan to start working in agriculture and to be able to buy a piece of land (the loan will help to benefit him).  His dream is to be able to buy himself a car.  He has not faced any problems in business previously.  In his free time he likes to play sports.

loans.use: to start work in agriculture and to be able to buy a piece of land

loans.name: Wesakulila B Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Wesakulila B Group in Western Kenya! Neddy is the facilitator of the Wesakulila B group. This group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program. 

Neddy is the mother of two children. She joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds and ensure food security for her family. In the recent 2011 season, Neddy had an excellent maize yield harvesting 10 bags on 1/2 an acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Neddy was only able to harvest two bags of maize on 1/2 acre of land. 

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Neddy and her group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

With income from her maize sales, Neddy will educate her children, ensure food security and invest in livestock rearing.

In 2012, the members of Wesakulila B group will each plant between ½ and 1 acre of maize. 

Neddy is pictured with her group members in the photograph as shown.

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Gloria Group

texts.fr: Le groupe GLORIA est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans la même zone. C'est la première  fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante  du groupe, du nom de Blanche est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Blanche est âgée de 28 ans et vit au Bénin. Blanche est mariée à un comptable du nom de Michel. Le couple a trois enfants tous scolarisés et  à leur charge. Blanche vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les charges de la famille.  Afin de contribuer aux diverses charges de la famille,  Blanche vend depuis quatre ans de l’huile à moteur à une place publique du Bénin. Blanche s’approvisionne dans une ville du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu,  Blanche sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe GLORIA, un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
The group GLORIA is comprised of three persons who live in the same area. This is the first time the group has requested financial aid from ALIDé to boost their business. The group's representative, named Blanche, is the one in the photo with her hand raised. 

Blanche is 28 years old and lives in Benin. She is married to an accountant named Michel. They have three children, all in school and in their care. Blanche lives with her husband and children. The couple jointly cover the family expenses. 

To help with the diverse expenses of the family, Blanche has been selling motor oil for four years at a public square in Benin. Her supplies come from a city in Benin.

Seeking to satisfy her customers and to increase her sales and revenues, Blanche and the other members of the group GLORIA are requesting an initial loan from ALIDé.

loans.use: to buy containers of motor oil

loans.name: Julia Elizabeth

texts.es:
Julia Elizabeth tiene 21 años de edad vive en unión libre tiene un hijo, vive con el esposo y con el hijo de res años de edad en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

La VRC LUCHANDO JUNTOS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Zapotal nuevo, Pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a Labores Comerciales en su mayoría. 

Julia se dedica desde hace dos años a la venta de mercadería y agriaultura, Las compras y las ventas lo realiza en Guayaquil.

Solicita el crédito para poder tener capital para la agricultura, Con la ayuda del crédito le ayudará a tener un beneficio más.

El sueño es poder tener una casa en los tiempos libres realiza quehaceres domésticos.
texts.en:
Julia Elizabeth is 21 years old.  She lives in a common law marriage and has a son.  She lives with her husband and three-year-old son in the Ventanas Canton in the Province of Los Ríos.

The communal bank "LUCHANDO JUNTOS" ["Striving Together"], is located in the new Zapotal district in Ventanas Canton.  The majority of its members work in retailing.

Julia has been working selling merchandise and farm produce for the last two years.  She makes her purchases and sales in Guayaquil.

She is requesting the loan to have capital for buying produce.  The loan will help her to have better profits.

Her dream is to be able to have her own home.  In her free time, she takes care of the household.

loans.use: to have capital for buying produce.

loans.name: Minonkpo Group

texts.fr: Le groupe MINONKPO est composé de trois personnes qui cohabitent ensemble. C'est la troisième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de leur activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Alexandrine est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Alexandrine est âgée de 34 ans et est mariée à un menuisier du nom de Gabriel. Le couple a trois enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Les diverses charges de la maison sont assurées par le couple. Pour y parvenir, Alexandrine mène comme activité depuis quinze ans la vente de sous vêtements de façon ambulante dans un marché du Bénin. Cette activité lui permet de subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants. Alexandrine s’approvisionne dans l’un des marchés du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaire et son revenu, Alexandrine sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe MINONKPO, un troisième crédit. Les deux premiers prêts ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The group MINONKPO is comprised of three persons who live together. This is the third time the group has requested financial aid from ALIDé to boost their business. The group's representative, named Alexandrine, is the one in the photo with her hand raised. 

Alexandrine is 34 years old and married to a furniture maker named Gabriel. They have three children, all in school and in their care. The diverse family expenses are covered by the couple. To do so, Alexandrine has been running a business selling undergarments from place to place at a market in Benin for about fifteen years. This business enables her to meet her needs and those of her children. Her supplies come from one of the markets of Benin. 

Seeking to satisfy her customers and to increase her sales and revenues, Alexandrine and the other members of the group MINONKPO are requesting a third loan from ALIDé. The two previous loans have indeed been repaid.

loans.use: to buy undergarments

loans.name: Duverney

texts.es: El señor Duverney a sus 21 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de diferente mercancía como camisas, camisetas, pijamas, medias, productos para la salud, belleza y el hogar; este oficio lo aprendió de un amigo quien hace año y medio le enseño a vender esta mercancía en el municipio de la Ceja situado al oriente de Antioquia. El señor Duverney desea comprar surtido de productos para la salud y belleza con el fin de aumentar sus ventas e ingresos y así mejorar su calidad de vida. El señor Duverney ha superado todas las dificultades a causa del invierno que le han dificultado la venta de sus productos. El señor Duverney sueña con tener su propio almacén con gran clientela y surtido.
texts.en:
Señor Duverney is 21 years old.  He works selling different merchandise such as shirts, sweatshirts, pajamas, hosiery, health and beauty products, and household products.  He learned this trade from a friend, who 18 months ago taught him to sell this merchandise in Ceja, a town to the east of Antioquia.

Señor Duverney wants to purchase products for health and beauty for his stock, with the goal of growing his sales and income and so improving his quality of life.  Señor Duverney has overcome all the difficulties that were caused by the winter, which made it more difficult to sell his products.  Señor Duverney dreams of having his own premises with a large customer base and large amount of stock.

loans.use: to buy health and beauty products for his stock.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
la socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de tienda de abarrotes,ella vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azucar,leche y galletas,la socia trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m,por medio de este negoicio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes.La solicita el credito para comprar productos para la tienda de abarrotes como arroz,azucar,leche y galletas al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Our associate continues to work in her small grocery store where she sells basic need products such as rice, sugar, milk and cookies, our associate works from 7:00 AM to 10:00 PM, through this business she gets her children ahead.  She wants to expand the business and requests a loan to buy wholesale products for the store such as rice, sugar, milk and cookies.  

Our associate is happy about the loan and commits to make the loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy wholesale products for her store such as rice, sugar, milk and cookies.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Nonvignonto Group

texts.fr: Le groupe NONVIGNONTO est composé de trois personnes qui cohabitent ensemble. C'est la sixième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Catherine est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Catherine est âgée de 43 ans et vit au Bénin. Catherine a arrêté l’école au niveau primaire. Catherine est mariée à un transitaire du nom de Philippe. Le couple a quatre enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Catherine vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Afin d‘assurer les diverses charges de la famille, Catherine vend depuis une vingtaine d’années, de la nourriture (riz, pâte alimentaire, haricot) qu'elle prépare et vend à son domicile. De façon secondaire, Catherine vend des savons. Catherine s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Catherine sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe NONVIGNONTO, un sixième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les cinq premiers prêts ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The group NONVIGNONTO is composed of three persons who live together. This is the sixth time the group has requested financial aid from ALIDé to boost their business. The group's representative, named Catherine, is the one in the photo with her hand raised. 

Catherine is 43 years old and lives in Benin. She is married to a shipping agent named Philippe. They have four children, all in school and in their care. She lives together with her husband and children. To cover the diverse family expenses, she has been selling food (rice, pasta, beans) for about twenty years. She makes the food and then sells it out of her home. Secondarily, she sells soaps. Her supplies come from a market in Benin.

Seeking to satisfy her customers and to increase her sales and revenues, Catherine and the other members of the group NONVIGNONTO are requesting a sixth loan from ALIDé. The five previous loans have indeed been repaid.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice and beans and some soap

loans.name: Roberta Yovanny

texts.es:
Roberta, es una madre soltera de 38 años de edad, tiene 2 hijos mayores de edad  , ella eligio este tipo de trabajo porque acompañaba a su hermana a vender ropa y porque le parece que de esta manera puede generar un poco más de ingresos para su hogar.  Roberta es una persona honesta, responsable y muy trabajadora con muchas ganas de sacar adelante a su familia , Roberta empezó en el negocio desde el año 2008, gana semanalmente S/. 250 soles , con el préstamo de S/. 1500 que recibirá gracias a Kiva lo invertirá para la compra de mercadería de estación ( polos, blusas, camisas, etc) una de sus metas es terminar de construir su casa  y llegar a tener su tienda  propia de ropa de buena calidad para que sea reconocida a nivel nacional para que de esta manera puedan vivir en mejores condiciones, su asesor de crédito piensa que es un buen cliente y que si cumplirá en pagar sus cuotas puntualmente.
Roberta  vive y trabaja en famous Nazca, or Nasca, Perú. The city is well known for the legendary Nazca Lines- a series of ancient, immense and inexplicable geoglyphs etched into the desert surrounding the city, generally attributed to the Nazca culture, which inhabited in the region from 300-800 AD. As such, the city attracts a considerable amount of tourism. But Nazca is also known for its hardworking people, who have preserved despite frequent earthquakes, tsunamis, and a high level of poverty in the region.
texts.en:
Roberta, aged 38, is the single mother of two adult children. She chose this kind of work because she accompanied her sister to sell clothes and thought that this way she could earn a bit more money for her household. Roberta is an honest, responsible and hard-working person, eager to bring up her family. Roberta started her business in 2008. She earns 250 new soles per week. She will use this loan of 1500 new soles, which will be provided through Kiva, to buy seasonal merchandise (T-shirts, blouses, shirts, etc.). One of her goals is to finish the construction of her home and open her own store, where she will sell high-quality clothes and be recognized at the national level, so that the family may live in better conditions. Her credit officer thinks that she is a good customer and will pay off her loan on schedule.

Roberta lives and works in famous Nazca, or Nasca, Peru. The city is well known for the legendary Nazca Lines, a series of ancient, immense and inexplicable geoglyphs etched into the desert surrounding the city, generally attributed to the Nazca culture, which inhabited the region from 300 BC to AD 800. As such, the city attracts a considerable amount of tourism. But Nazca is also known for its hard-working people, who have preserved their culture despite frequent earthquakes, tsunamis and a high level of poverty in the region.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (blouses, shirts, trousers, etc.).

loans.name: Santos Erodita

texts.es:
La señora Santos tiene 53 años de edad, vive con su esposo, dos hijos y una nieta.

Ella junto con su familia tiene más de dos años de trabajar en la agricultura, sembrando maíz y fríjol, de esa forma ella brinda el estudio a sus hijos.

La señora Santos solicita el préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar una camionada de arena y 20 bolsas de cemento, para cementar el piso de su casa ya que en invierno se moja por que es de tierra. Con esto ella, obtendrá los materiales que necesita para mejorar su vivienda y sus nietas podrán jugar con seguridad en su casa. Santos desea continuar trabajando en la agricultura, para ayudar a su nieta que esta en la universidad.
texts.en:
Señora Santos, aged 53, lives with her husband, two children and a granddaughter. She has been working for more than two years with her family in agriculture, growing corn and beans. This way her children can study.

Santos came to the microfinance institution Fundación Campo and applied for a loan to buy a truckload of sand and 20 sacks of cement to get a concrete floor in her house, because today it is made of compressed earth and in winter humidity creeps into the house. She will buy the required materials to improve her home and her granddaughters will be able to play safely in it. Santos wants to continue working in agriculture to help her granddaughter who is studying at the university.

loans.use: to buy a truckload of sand and 20 sacks of cement to get a concrete floor in her house.

loans.name: Emma Delia

texts.es:
Emma Delia tiene 26 años de edad es soltera  tiene cuatro hijos, vive con la mamá y con los hijos de 7, 3, 5 y 1 año de edad  en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

La VRC LUCHANDO JUNTOS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Zapotal nuevo, Pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a Labores Comerciales en su mayoría. 

Emma se dedica a la agricultura y ha realizar quehaceres domésticos, Las compras de los productos agrícolas lo hace en Ventanas.
Solicita el crédito para poder comprar productos agrícolas,semillas, abonos, urea, insecticidas con el dinero del crédito le ayudará a obtener mejores beneficios.

El sueño es poder tener una casa, no se le han presentado ningún tipo de problemas, en los tiempos libres le gusta pasar el día con los hijos.
texts.en:
Emma Delia is 26 years old and is single.  She has four children, and lives with her mom and her children who are aged 7, 3, 5, and 1 year in the Ventanas Canton in the Province of Los Ríos.

The communal bank "LUCHANDO JUNTOS" ["Striving Together"], is located in the new Zapotal district in the Ventanas Canton.  The majority of its members work in in retail businesses.

Emma works doing domestic chores.  She makes her purchases and sales in Comisariato.

She is requesting the loan to be able to improve her business.  The money from the loan will help her to earn better profits.

Her dream is to have her own home.  She hasn't come across any types of problems in her business.  In her free time, she likes to spend time with her children.

loans.use: para poder comprar productos agrícolas,semillas, abonos, urea, insecticidas

loans.name: Henry

texts.es: El señor Henry a sus 52 años de edad, se dedica a la cría de pollos de engorde y gallinas en la finca en la cual trabaja como Mayordomo, en ésta su jefe le da el permiso para que realice esta labor hace ya varios años.  El señor Henry desea adecuar el piso y el techo del lugar donde tiene sus pollos y gallinas, esto le permitirá que los animales se críen de forma adecuada, lo cual generará mayor rentabilidad, ya que actualmente sus animales se están enfermando debido a la humedad en el lugar donde permanecen. El señor Henry sueña con tener un galpón (lugar donde se crían los pollos y las gallinas) grande y que cumpla con todos los requisitos  y comercializar pollos de engorde y huevos en todos los supermercados del sector; adicional a esto brindar una mejor calidad de vida a sus dos hijos.
texts.en:
Señor Henry is 52 years old.  He works raising chickens and hens on the farm where he works as the steward.  His boss has given him permission to do this work, which he has been doing for several years.  

Señor Henry wants to make improvements to the floor and roof of the space where he keeps his chickens and hens.  This will allow the fowl to be raised properly and generate better profitability, as currently his fowl are getting sick from the humidity in their present location.

Señor Henry's dream is to have a large barn where he can raise chickens and hens, and which would meet all his requirements.  He would be able to sell fattened chickens and eggs to all the area supermarkets; this would also provide a better quality of life for his two children.

loans.use: to make improvements to the floor and roof of the location where he raises his chickens and hens.

loans.name: Fabian Antonio

texts.es:
Fabián Antonio tiene 29 años D. edad es casado tiene tres hijos, vive con L. esposa y con los hijos D. 7, 5 y un año D. edad en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia D. los Ríos.

L. VRC LUCHANDO JUNTOS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Zapotal nuevo, Pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a Labores Comerciales en su mayoría. 

Fabián  se dedica a L. agricultura desD.  hace 14 años, Las compras y las ventas lo realiza en Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para L. agricultura, compra D. abonos, semillas, fertilizantes, urea, Con el dinero del crédito le ayudaría a obtener mejores beneficios. 

El sueño es poder comprarse un terreno no se le ha presentado ningún tipo D. problema. 

En los tiempos libres le gusta ver televisión.
texts.en:
Fabián Antonio is 29 years old and is married with three children.  He lives with his wife and children, aged 7,5, and 1 year, in the Ventanas Canton in the Province of Los Ríos.

The communal bank "LUCHANDO JUNTOS" ["Striving Together"] is located in the new Zapotal district, in the Ventanas Canton.  The majority of its members work in retail-related businesses.

Fabián has been working in agriculture for the last 14 years.  He makes his purchases and sales in Ventanas.

He is requesting the loan for his farming.  The money from the loan will help him to earn better profits.

His dream is to be able to buy some land.  He hasn't experienced any problems with his business.

In his free time, he likes to watch television.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, and urea

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es: Gladys  es una mujer de 77 años que tiene 3 hijos en las edades de 44 a 47 años. Ella es propietaria de un negocio que está ubicado en un centro comercial del centro de la ciudad, donde  comercializa artículos variados como vajillas, electrodomésticos menores, entre otras mercancías , actividad en la que tiene 50 años de experiencia. En condición de mujer separada con sus esfuerzos en el trabajo logró sacar a su hogar adelante  y hoy sus hijos todos conforman su propio hogar y cuenta como   colaborador especial con su último hijo, quien se encarga  de la atención a sus clientes y viaja periódicamente para comprar la mercancía y venderla en su punto comercial. A su microempresa Gladys  ha aplicado todos sus esfuerzos logrando, además de bienestar en el hogar,  tener su propia casa; ahora su principal sueño es ampliar el  negocio y adecuarlo en un local más amplio para comercializar electrodomésticos de mayor tamaño. El propósito  de Gladys de crecimiento lo ha logrado poco a poco, por eso en la actualidad ha tenido 3 financiamientos con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo,  lo cual  ha sido su fuente de crecimiento con los cuales ha logrado ampliar su capital de trabajo, desarrolla varias líneas de productos, ampliar su mercado y aun planea crecer mucho más, esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento mediante este fondo, a través del cual logrará comprar artículos, surtir su negocio con juguetería electrodomésticos menores y adornos navideños,  para hacer su mejor venta en las navidades y año nuevo.
texts.en:
Gladys is a 77 year-old woman with three children aged 44 to 47. She owns a business at a shopping center located downtown. She sells a wide array of products such as dishware, small household appliances and others. She has more than 50 years of experience in this business.
As a divorced woman she had to work very hard in order to provide for her children, all of whom have formed their own families now. She relies particularly on her youngest child, who helps her taking care of customers and travels periodically to buy the products she sells. 
Gladys has focused all her efforts in her small business. This has allowed her to have a house of her own, besides providing for her children. Her biggest dream now is to expand her business and have bigger premises so she can sell larger household appliances. 
Gladys has achieved her growth objectives little by little. She has had 3 loans with our institution, which have been her source of growth. She has been able to increase her working capital, develop new lines of products and broaden her market. She plans to grow even more, so she is applying for her first Kiva loan in order to purchase new products and stock her business with toys, small household appliances and Christmas ornaments, so she can make her greatest profit during the holiday season.

loans.use: stock her business with toys, small household appliances and Christmas ornaments

loans.name: Aida De Jesús

texts.es: Aida de Jesús de 54 años de edad, habita en casa propia junto con su hija la cual ya es mayor de edad y le ayuda con los gastos del hogar. Aida se caracteriza por ser muy trabajadora, responsable y carismática. Gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado establecer un pequeño puesto en el mercado de la zona donde habita en el cual vende medicina.  El negocio está muy bien ubicado ya que es un lugar muy concurrido y visitado por muchas personas. Aida ha trabajado durante mucho tiempo para sacar adelante a su familia y gracias a Dios su hija ya se encuentra trabajando y colabora un poco con los gastos del hogar.  Para Aida su negocio es parte de su vida no se imagina estar sin el. Es por esta razón que ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL con el objetivo de mantener surtido su negocio de tal manera que pueda mantenerlo activo por mucho más tiempo.  El crédito lo quiere invertir en la compra diferentes medicamentos (vitaminas, pastillas para dolores, medicamentos naturales, medicamentos para parásitos, etc.)  de tal manera que los clientes se sientan satisfechos con el servicio que ella ofrece. De esta forma  espera mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Aida de Jesús, age 54, lives in her own home with her grown daughter, who helps out with the household costs. Aida is a very hard worker. She is responsible and charismatic. Thanks to her hard work and dedication, she has been able to establish a small stall in a local market where she sells medicine. Her business is in a very good location, as it is a high-traffic area. Aida has worked for a long time to get her family ahead, and thanks to God her daughter has found a job and can help out a little with the household costs. For Aida, her business is part of her life and she couldn't imagine not having it. For this reason, she has decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL with the goal of keeping her store stocked so that she can keep it going for a long time. She wants to invest this loan in different medications (vitamins, pain pills, natural medicines, anti-parasitic medicines, etc) so that her customers will be satisfied with her service. She hopes to be able to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy: vitamines, pain pills, natural medicines, anti-parasitic medicines, etc.

loans.name: Tukolane Group

texts.en:
Hassani, who is in his mid-40s, is married, with three children who are still going to school. He has been a tailor since 1970. He works from 7:30 a.m. to 8:00 p.m daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be his seventh loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans to buy materials for his business, buy another sewing machine, and take care of his family. He has paid back all his loans successfully. He wants a loan to buy more materials and to pay his children's school fees. His dream is to one day be able to build his own house.

He will share this loan with his loan group "Tukolane." This group has a total of 20 members, who will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.

loans.use: to buy more materials and to pay school fees.

loans.name: Johanna Lissette

texts.es:
Johanna Lissette tiene 27 años de edad vive en unión libre tiene tres hijos, vive con el esposo y con los hijos de 12, 7, 5 años de edad en el Cantón Ventanas provincia de los ríos.

La VRC LUCHANDO JUNTOS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Zapotal nuevo, Pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a Labores Comerciales en su mayoría. 

Johanna se dedica a trabajar en un salón de belleza es manicurista, las compras y las ventas lo realiza en manicurista en Ventanas. Solicita el crédito para poder aumentar la vivienda.

Con la ayuda del crédito le ayudaría a poder arreglar la casa y poderse cambiar.

El sueño es poder vivir mejor en los tiempos libres le gusta pintarse las uñas.
texts.en:
Johanna Lissette is 27. She is in a common-law marriage and lives with her husband and children, ages 12, 7, and 5. They live in the Ventanas canton, Los Rios province.

The Luchando Juntos communal bank is located in the Zapotal Nuevo district, belonging to the Ventanas canton. The majority of the members are merchants.

Johanna works in a beauty salon as a manicurist. She buys and sells products in a beauty salon in Ventanas. She is requesting this loan to expand her home.

With the help of this loan she will be able to fix up her house and make some changes.

Her dream is to have a better standard of living. In her free time she likes to paint her nails.

loans.use: to expand her home.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: El socio Juan continua con su trabajo de constructor en obras; el socio realiza trabajos como albañil, el socio también trabja la tierra el socio tiene sus terrenos de cultivo de papa, en esta ocasión el socio desea abonar sus terrenos y comprar fertilizantes para la tierra, el socio solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de fertilizantes para abonar los terrenos de cultivo de papa.
texts.en: Juanis still working as a builder. He works as a bricklayer and also farms. He has lands where he grows potatoes. He now wants to buy fertilizer to fertilize his land. He is requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of fertilizers for his potato crops.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of fertilizers for his potato crops.

loans.name: Zaida

texts.es: La señora Zaida nacida en santa Cruz, es casada con el señor Antonio tienen  dos hijos que se encuentran estudiando,   viven en la zona del kilometro 9 por mas de 20 años, ella se dedica a  la venta de ropa que ella confecciona, y miércoles y sábado  entrega la ropa que ella elabora  a distintos puestos de venta que le hacen pedidos, entrega al por mayor pero también vende por menor, ella trabaja junto a su hermana  quien le ayuda dos veces por semana a la entrega de los pedidos, y los demás días le ayuda en lo que es la confección de prendas de vestir, con el dinero del crédito comprara tela por rollo e hilos para la confección de prendas de vestir, la Sra. Zaida es una persona muy trabajadora se esfuerza cada día par dar un futuro mejor a sus hijos, su deseo es poder tener un taller mas grande y emplear mano de obra y poder expandir sus prendas de vestir a las ciudades de Cochabamba y Tarija.
texts.en:
Señora Zaida was born in Santa Cruz.  She is married to Señor Antonio; they have two children who attend school.  They have been living in the Kilometer 9 area for more than 20 years.  

She works selling clothes that she sews, and on Wednesdays and Saturdays she delivers the clothes that she has made to several sales locations that have placed orders.  She makes her deliveries at wholesale, but also sells direct.  She works together with her sister, who helps her out twice a week with delivering the orders, and on the other days helps her with sewing the clothing.

With the money from the loan, she will buy rolls of fabric and thread for sewing clothing.  

Señora Zaida is a very hard-working person who strives each day for a better future for her children.  Her desire is to have a much bigger workshop and employ workers, and to be able to expand selling her clothes to Cochabamba an Tarija

loans.use: to buy rolls of fabric and thread for sewing clothing.

loans.name: Gbenonkpo 2 Group

texts.fr: Le groupe GBENONKPO 2 est composé de trois personnes qui vivent dans le même quartier. C'est la septième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante  du groupe, du nom de Fidèle est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Fidèle est âgée de 65 ans et vit au Bénin. Fidèle n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Fidèle est une veuve et mère de quatre enfants dont certains scolarisés. Les enfants ne sont plus à sa charge. Fidèle vit seule. Afin de subvenir à ses besoins, Fidèle vend depuis une trentaine d’année, du pain sucré de façon ambulante dans un marché du Bénin. De façon secondaire, Fidèle vend de divers produits (bicarbonates, éponges en fer). Fidèle s’approvisionne dans un marché au Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Fidèle sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe GBENONKPO 2, un septième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les six premiers prêts ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: The GBENONKPO 2 group is made up of three people who live in the same neighborhood. It’s the seventh time that this group is seeking financial aid from ALIDé in order to increase the level of their business. The representative of the group is named Fidèle and is the one raising her hand in the photo. Fidèle is 65 years old and lives in Bénin. Fidèle did not attend school. Fidèle is a widow and mother of four children, some of whom have attended school. The children are no longer under her care. Fidèle lives alone. In order to meet her needs, Fidèle has been selling sweet bread from place to place at a market in Bénin for about thirty years. Fidèle also sells miscellaneous products (bicarbonates, iron sponges). Fidèle stocks up at a market in Bénin. In the quest to satisfy her clientele and to increase her business numbers and revenue, Fidèle is seeking with the other members of the GBENONKPO 2 group a seventh loan with ALIDé. The six previous loans were fully repaid.

loans.use: to buy shoes, bicarbonates, and sponges

loans.name: Marta Luz

texts.es: Marta Luz  de 63 años de edad, habita en casa propia junto con su querido hijo el cual es todo para ella. Marta es muy trabajadora, dedicada y luchadora. Hace ya varios años que logro establecer una pequeña tienda en su hogar de residencia en la cual vende variedad de productos como: lácteos, verduras, cereales, detergente, entre otros. Con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación ha mantenido su tiendita y gracias a Dios y al árduo trabajo que día a día realiza los resultados obtenidos han sido favorables. Además su carisma es incomparable para ella lo más importante es que sus clientes siempre estén satisfechos con el servicio que reciben. El negocio está ubicado en una zona muy concurrida y visitada por muchas personas en especial el negocio de Marta que cada día son más las personas que se acercan en busca de los productos que ella ofrece. Su sueño es seguir manteniendo activo su negocio ya que es su principal fuente de ingresos y de esta forma ha llevado el pan de cada día a su casa. Por todo lo anterior ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL  para invertir en su negocio en la compra de productos de tienda  teles como: Lácteos, verduras, arroz, frijoles, sal, azúcar, leche, detergente y de mas productos que permitan a traer a mas clientes de tal forma que pueda lograr su objetivo de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia. Marta guarda un profundo agradecimiento con INTEGRAL ya que gracias a la confianza que le prestaron en el pasado, logró establecer su negocio y seguir operando. Espera que esta vez la institución deposite de nuevo la confianza en ella.
texts.en:
Marta Luz is 63 years old.  She lives in her own home together with her much-loved son, who is her world.  Marta is very hard-working, dedicated, and committed.  

Several years ago, she was able to establish a small store in her home, from where she sells a variety of products such as dairy products, vegetables, cereals, and detergent among other things.  With great effort and dedication she has been able to keep up her little store, and thanks to God and to her hard work, she has been able to get favorable results on a daily basis.  In addition, she has incomparable charisma and the most important thing to her is that her customers are always satisfied with the service they receive.

The business is located in a very busy area, which is visited by many people. Marta's store in particular has increasing numbers of people who come there looking for the products that she offers for sale.

Her dream is to continue keeping her business active as it is her main source of income, and in this way she can earn her daily bread.  For all the preceding reasons, she has taken the decision to request this loan from INTEGRAL to invest in her business.  She will purchase products for her store such as dairy products, vegetables, rice, beans, salt, sugar, milk, detergent and other products that will allow her to bring in more customers in such a way that she will be able to achieve her objective of improving her quality of life and that of her family.

Marta has a profound gratitude towards INTEGRAL, as thanks to the trust that they have placed in her in the past, she has been able to establish her business and keep it going.  She hopes that on this occasion the institution will once again show confidence in her.

loans.use: to buy products for her store, such as dairy products, vegetables, rice, beans, salt, sugar, milk and detergent.

loans.name: Carlos Enrique

texts.es:
Carlos Enrique tiene 30 años de edad vive en unión libre no tiene hijos, vive con la esposa en el cantón Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

La VRC LUCHANDO JUNTOS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Zapotal nuevo, Pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a Labores Comerciales en su mayoría. 

Carlos es maestro vulcanizador, arregla llantas de vehículos hace 11 años de edad las compras lo hace en Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para ponerse un negocio de llantas para todo vehículo. Con la ayuda del crédito habrá un beneficio en el negocio y mejorará el estilo de vida de la familia.

En los tiempos libres le gusta trabajar más.
texts.en:
Carlos Enrique is 30 and in a common-law marriage. He and his wife live together in the Ventanas canton, Los Rios province, and have no children.

The Luchando Juntos communal bank is located in the Zapotal Nuevo district, belonging to the Ventanas canton. The majority of the group members are merchants.

Carlos has been a master tire repairman for eleven years and makes his purchases and sales in Ventanas.

He is requesting this loan to start a tire business. This loan will benefit his business.

In his free time he likes to work more.

loans.use: to start a tire business

loans.name: San Miguel Group

texts.es:
10 mujeres muy trabajadoras de la ciudad de Santaní se unieron con el objetivo de trabajar conjuntamente dentro del programa de la fundación paraguaya. Ellas desean ayudar a sus familias, y ven en el comité una gran ayuda para ellas y sus sueños. La mayoría de estas mujeres son jefas de familia que se encargan de mantener sus casas.
Gloria, es una de las miembros, ella se dedica a la cría de aves de corral, como ser gallinas, trabajo gracias al cual ha podido ayudar en la casa y mantener a su familia. Ella ve una gran oportunidad en la ayuda que la fundación le brinda a través del programa, es por ello que se esfuerza al máximo para poder seguir. Uno de sus sueños es tener una granja donde criar todo tipo de animales.
Como camino a cumplir su sueño, ella solicita la ayuda de la fundación para la compra de aves, y alimentos para estos, lo cual le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
10 very hardworking women from the city of Santaní join forces with the goal of working together within the Fundación Paraguaya program. They want to help their families and they see the committee as a huge support to them and their dreams. The majority of these women are the heads of their households, and so they look after the upkeep of their homes.

Gloria is one of the members and she breeds poultry, such as chickens, for a living. Through this work, she has been able to help with her house and look after her family. She looks upon the help that the foundation provide, through the program, as a great opportunity and therefore she is doing her very best to carry on. One of her dreams to have a farm where she can raise all types of animals.

To help her achieve her dream, she is requesting help from the foundation to purchase poultry and feed, which will be a great help to her.

loans.use: to buy poultry for breeding and feed for them.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es: La socia Paulina compra y vende granos secos como habas, frejoles, maíz de variedades, arbejas, cebada, trigo, y otros cereales tambien; la socia tambien vende maíz para la siembra, en esta ocasion la socia desea invertir el prestamo en la compra de maíz para vender para la siembra y comprar cereales y granos secos para vender en su stand. La socia desea seguir creciendo economicamente para dar a sus hijos calidad de vida; la socia con el ingreso de sus ventas ha ido comprando su terrenito y construyendo junto a sus conyugue su vivienda. La socia desea invertir el prestamo para comprar maiz y granos para incrementar us negocio.
texts.en: The member, Pauline, buys and sells dried grain such as broad beans, kidney beans, different kinds of corn, peas, barley, wheat and other cereals. The member also sells corn for sowing. On this occasion, the member would like to invest the loan in the purchase of corn which she will sell for sowing, and also dried cereals and grains which she will sell at her stand. The member wants to continue to develop economically in order to provide her children with a good quality of life. With the income achieved from her sales, the member has bought her own small plot of land and built her home with her spouse. The member wants to invest the loan in the purchase of corn and grain to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy corn and grain to improve her business.

loans.name: Marina

texts.es:
Marina se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de ropa para niños como polos,chompas,pantalones y medias, y tambien la socia tiene un pequeño restuarnta donde prepara almuerzos y cenas,por medios de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de ropa y mejorar el negocio de restaurant.La socia solicita el credito para comprar pantalones,polos y chompas y tambien para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz,verduras,pollos y carnes al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Marina continues with her business of selling children's clothes such as polo shirts, sweaters, pants and thights, she also has a small restaurant where she makes lunch and dinner, through these two businesses she gets her children ahead, our associate wants to expand and improve both businesses.  She requests a loan to buy pants, polo shirts, sweaters and wholesale ingredients to cook with such as rice, vegetables, chicken and meat

She is happy about the loan and is committed to making the necessary loan payments.

loans.use: to buy pants, polo shirts, sweaters and wholesale ingredients to cook with such as rice, vegetables, chicken and meat.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.es: Ruth de 47 años de edad vive en la ciudad de Barranquilla con su esposo y sus dos hijos en las edades de 9 y 20 años. Allí tiene un negocio donde se dedica a la comercialización de ropa, calzado y bolso, entre otros artículos a lo que siempre está dispuesto a venderles a sus clientes cuando estos se lo solicitan.  El negocio inició hace 2 años cuando la sobrina viajaba a Panamá y traía  mercancía para la venta.  Aunque Ruth anteriormente trabajó en una empresa, aprovechó esta oportunidad y se dedicó a ser independiente, dándole curso librea su espíritu emprendedor y para resolver la atención de su pequeño hijo, cuando este nació. Al principio fue su sobrina quien le dio mercancía para que la vendiera,  y apoyara a su esposo con los gastos del hogar, hasta entonces a cargo de él.  En sus primeros paninos, obtenía la mercancía a consignación  en un periodo de 4 meses,  hasta que logró concentrar su propio capital y generar mayor independencia en sus compras. Sus principales clientes están ubicados en el barrio donde habita y en las comunidades aledañas, así mismo son empleados de empresas públicas y privadas. En la actualidad está aplicando a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo con el cual comprará vestidos y calzados para damas e infantil, aprovechando que al final de año, sus clientes actualizan su vestuario y se preparan con vestidos nuevos para estar felices en las fiestas familiares de navidad y año nuevo.
texts.en:
Ruth, 47, lives in the city of Barranquilla with her husband and two children who are 9 and 20 years old.  She has a business there selling clothing, shoes and purses, among other articles; she’s always ready to sell to her customers when they request it.

The business started two years ago when a niece would travel to Panama and bring back merchandise to sell.  Although Ruth used to work for a firm, she availed herself of this opportunity and decided to become independent letting her enterprising spirit fly.  This also allowed her to watch after her newborn son.  At first it was her niece who gave her the merchandise to sell and help her husband cover household expenses which up to then had been entirely his responsibility.  In her initial ventures she’d get the merchandise for four-month consignments until she gathered her own capital and was able to become more independent with her purchases.  Her main customers are located in the neighborhood where she lives and in adjacent communities; they are employees of public and private enterprises.

She is currently applying for a Kiva loan, her first financing with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo that she plans to use to buy dresses and shoes for women and children taking advantage that at the end of the year her customers tend to renew their wardrobes and buy new dresses to happily spend the Christmas and New Year festivities.

loans.use: to buy dresses and shoes for women and children.

loans.name: Vanessa Katherine

texts.es:
Vanessa tiene 23 años de edad vive en unión libre tiene dos hijas, vive con el esposo y con las dos hijas gemelas de 4 años de edad en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

La VRC LUCHANDO JUNTOS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Zapotal nuevo, Pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a Labores Comerciales en su mayoría.
 
Vanessa se dedica a realizar quehaceres domésticos y a la agricultura hace 5 años atrás, Las compras y las ventas lo realiza en Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para el mejoramiento del sembrío, comprar semillas, urea, fertilizantes, insecticidas, abonos. Con la ayuda del préstamo obtendrá un buen beneficio.

El sueño es poder comprarse una casa, no se le ha presentado ningún tipo de problema en la agricultura.

En los tiempos libres le gusta ver televisión y practicar el deporte.
texts.en:
Vanessa, 23, lives in a common law relationship and has two daughters.  She lives with her husband and two twin four-year-old daughters in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.  

The “Luchando Juntos” communal bank is located in Recinto Zapotal Nuevo that belongs to Ventanas Canton; most of the members are involved in commercial activities.

Vanessa has been doing domestic chores and farming for the last five years.  Her purchases and her sales take place in Ventanas.

She’s asking for the loan to improve her crops; with help from the loan she’ll obtain a good benefit.

Her dream is to be able to buy a house; she’s had no type of problem.  In her free time she likes to watch television.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, urea, fertilizers, insecticides, and compost

loans.name: Mercy Zoraya

texts.es:
Mercy Soraya tiene 40 años de edad vive en unión libre tiene dos hijos, vive con el esposo, padres y los hijos de 19 y 16 años de edad en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

La VRC LUCHANDO JUNTOS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Zapotal nuevo, Pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a Labores Comerciales en su mayoría. 

Mercy se dedica a la agricultura compra de insumos agrícolas, semillas, y además a la venta de gas  hace tres años, las compras y las ventas lo realiza en Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para mejorar los sembríos comprar semillas, fertilizantes, urea, líquidos, con la ayuda del crédito obtendrá mejores beneficios.

El sueño es tener una casan en los tiempos libres le gusta escuchar música
texts.en:
Mercy Soraya is 40 years old living in a common law relationship; she has two children.  She lives with her husband, her parents and her children who are 19 and 16 years of age in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.

The “Luchando Juntos” communal bank is located in Recinto Zapotal Nuevo belonging to Ventanas Canton; most of the members carry out commercial activities.

Mercy is a farmer who buys agricultural inputs like seeds, and has also been a gas merchant for the last three years.  Her purchases and her sales take place in Ventanas.

She’s asking for the loan to improve her crops and purchase seeds, fertilizers, urea and liquids. With help from the loan she’ll obtain better benefits.  Her dream is to own a house and in her free time she enjoys listening to music.

loans.use: to improve the harvest and purchase seeds, fertilizers, urea, and liquids

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es: La socia Antonia continua con su panadería y la elaboracion de panes, ella ahora que comienzan las fiestas navideñas; desea comprar harina, al por mayor, manteca por kilos, levadura, leña para el horno y elaborar panes, tortas, kekes tipo panetones. La socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de harinas, levadura, leña para el horno, manteca al por mayor. La socia esta creciendo y ahora desea invertir mas para poder abastecer a sus clientes. La socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de harina, levadura, manteca, leña para el horno.
texts.en: Antonia continues with her bakery and baking bread.  Now that the Christmas holidays are starting she wants to buy flour at wholesale, shortening by the kilogram, yeast and firewood for the oven to bake bread, cakes, Panettone-type cakes.  She requests the loan to buy flour, yeast, firewood for the oven and shortening at wholesale.  She is growing and wants to invest more to meet customer demand.  She is requesting the loan to buy flour, yeast, shortening and firewood for the oven.

loans.use: to buy flour, yeast, shortening and firewood for the oven.

loans.name: Gustavo Adolfo

texts.es:
Gustavo Adolfo tiene 26 años D. edad  vive en unión libre tiene una hija, vive con L. esposa y con L. hija D. tres años D. edad en el Cantón Ventanas provincia D. los Ríos.

L. VRC LUCHANDO JUNTOS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Zapotal nuevo, Pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a Labores Comerciales en su mayoría. 

Gustavo se dedica a l a Agricultura las compras y las ventas lo realizan en Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para comprar insumos, líquidos para matar L. maleza y poder mejorar el desmonte.

Con el crédito podrá obtener mejores beneficios. El sueño es poderse comprar una casa, no se le ha presentado ningún tipo D. problema, en los tiempos libres le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Gustavo Adolfo, 26, lives in a common law relationship; he has a daughter.  He lives with his wife and three-year-old daughter in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.

The “Luchando Juntos” communal bank is located in Recinto Zapotal Nuevo belonging to Ventanas Canton; most of the members carry out commercial activities.

Gustavo is a farmer.  His purchases and his sales take place in Ventanas.  He requests the loan to buy supplies, weed killing liquids and to improve clearing his fields.

With help from the loan he will be able to obtain better benefits.  His dream is being able to buy a house.  He’s had no problems and in his free time he enjoys playing sports.

loans.use: to buy supplies, weed killing liquids and to improve the clearning of the fields.

loans.name: Albertina

texts.es:
La señora Albertina, tiene 65 años de edad, vive con una hija y su nieta.

Ella es una mujer muy luchadora, se dedica a la venta de tortillas, fue su mamá quien le enseño este oficio desde la edad de 8 años. Antes Albertina trabajaba en las algodoneras, pero luego se dedico a la venta de tortillas.

Los insumos que necesita, para elaborar las tortillas los compra en una ciudad del oriente del país, que esta a treinta y cinco minutos de su vivienda. Albertina solicita el préstamo a Fundación Campo, para invertirlo en la reparación del piso de la cocina y reparar la fuga de agua de su pila, ya que con las inundaciones que sucedieron en octubre su casa quedo dañada, por lo que ahora ella desea hacerle esas reparaciones. Debido a la fuga de agua que tiene la pila, el recibo del agua es muy alto, albertina tiene que bajar hasta la laguna para lavar la ropa y se le dificulta estarse movilizando tanto, por que ya es una señora. Ella lo que desea es mejorar su casa poco a poco, el ponerle piso, repellar las paredes y construir una nueva habitación.
texts.en:
Señora Albertina, aged 65, lives with a daughter and her granddaughter. She is a hard-struggling woman who sells tortillas. It was her mother who taught her this activity when she was 8 years old. Until recently, Albertina was a cotton farmer, but now she sells tortillas. She buys the ingredients in a town in eastern El Salvador, 35 minutes from her home.

Albertina came to the microfinance institution Fundación Campo and applied for a loan to repair her kitchen floor and her water basin which is leaking. In October, the floods damaged her home and Albertina wants to make these repairs. Due to the leakage in her basin, her water bill is very high. Albertina is forced to go down to the lake to wash clothes, but because of her age this is no mean task. She wants to improve her home step by step, making the floor, plastering the walls and building a new room.

loans.use: to repair her kitchen floor and her water basin which is leaking.

loans.name: Ivan De Jesús

texts.es: El señor Iván a sus 54 años de edad, se dedica a la producción y comercialización de café en su finca ubicada en el municipio de Santa Bárbara localizado en el sur de Antioquia. La finca en la cual tiene sus cultivos el señor Iván la compro a un familiar hace 20 años con el dinero de una liquidación y  bonificación que le dieron al finalizar su trabajo en una finca de recreo, desde entonces ha construido su casa y mejorando los terreros para sus cultivos.
