La VRC ALAS DE CRISTO  se encuentra ubicada en las calles sucre y Ernesto Briones, pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores Comerciales en General.

Isabel se dedica a trabajar vendiendo comida ofrece desayunos, almuerzoa, meriendas. Las compras y las ventas lo realiza en el comisariato. Solicita el crédito para comprar verduras, carnes, frutas.

Con la ayuda del crédito tendría mayores ingresos.El Sueño es poder tener un carro, No se le ha presentado ningún tipo de problema.

En los momentos libres le gusta leer la biblia.
texts.en:
Isabel María is 61 years old, is married, and has four children.  She lives in the canton Ventanas, in the province of los Ríos, with her husband and with her children who are 43, 40, 42, and 39 years old.

The VRC ALAS DE CRISTO [Wings of Christ] is located on the streets of Sucre and Ernesto Briones.  It is located in the canton Ventanas and is focused on commercial labor in general.

Isabel works selling food.  She offers breakfast, lunch, and snacks.  She makes purchases and sales in the store.  She is asking for the loan to purchase vegetables, meats, and fruits.

With the help of the loan she would have better income.  Her dream is to be able to have a car.  She has not presented any kind of problem.

In her free time she likes to read the Bible.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, meats, and fruits.

loans.name: Deysi Beatriz

texts.es:
Deysi nació en el distrito de Urubamba de la provincia de Urubamba del departamento del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació, ella tiene 32 años de edad y tiene una relación de libre de la cual tiene un hijo. 
 
Deysi desarrolla sus actividades cotidianas y económicas en la ciudad de Urubamba, ella tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes en su domicilio. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. 

Deysi requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar y otras cosas más.  

Deysi se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma. Deysi pertenece al banco comunal “Tercer Milenio” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad de Urubamba.
texts.en:
Deysi was born in the Urubamba district and province in the Cusco department.  She lives in the same city where she was born.  She is 32 years old and has a free relationship from which she has a child.

Deysi performs her daily and economical activities in the city of Urubamba.  She has a small grocery store in her home.  She has already spent several years in this business, and it is going very well for her thanks to the determination that she puts into her work.

Deysi is requesting the loan to buy merchandise like sacks of rice, sacks of sugar, and other things.

Deysi is thankful for the opportunity offered to her in this way.  She promises to follow through with the payments corresponding to the schedule.  Deysi belongs to the communal bank "Tercer Milenio" ["Third Millennium"] of the city of Urubamba's Araiwa Association.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like sacks of rice, sacks of sugar, and more.

loans.name: Mariana Mercedes

texts.es:
Doña María de 55 años de edad, habitante de la ciudad de León, casada, de oficio comerciante, no tiene hijos debido a los tratamientos a los cuales estuvo sometida para eliminar quistes que le aparecieron  en la matriz, es una mujer fuerte y luchadora que no se dio por vencida por ganarle la batalla al cáncer. Ella  se dedica a la venta y elaboración negocio que heredo de su mama hace 22 años, también es dueña de una pulpería que puso hace 12 años donde comercializa productos de consumo para el hogar y ropa.
Ella realizo el préstamo  comprar ropa, gaseosas y maíz, papas, carne, vegetales para realizar sus deliciosos nacatamales. Pues se acerca la época navideña donde las ventas son muy buenas y quiere tener de todo producto para ofrecer a sus clientes. Ella desea progresar su negocio ampliar su pulpería con productos de  gran necesidad en su zona.
texts.en:
Doña María is 55 years old and lives in the city of Leon. She is married, a businesswoman by trade and without children because of the treatmentst she was subjected to for cysts in the womb. She a strong and determined woman who never gave up in her fight against cancer. She sells and makes tamales, a business she inherited from her mother 22 years ago. She also owns a grocery store which she set up 12 years ago where she sells consumer products for the home and clothing.

She took the loan to purchase clothing, soft drinks, corn, potatoes, meat, vegetables to make her delicious tamales, as the Christmas season is approaching which is when sales are very good and she wants to have all kinds of products to offer her customers. She wants to grow her business, expand her grocery store with products of great need for her area.

loans.use: to buy clothes, soft drinks and corn, potatoes, meat, vegetables to make her delicious tamales.

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es:
Jorge es una persona trabajadora que  tiene 16 años de estar en el negocio  de ventas  al por mayor de banano y plátano, los cuales trae de la zona del Urabá Antioqueño.  Este es un negocio que   Jorge conoce muy bien,  tienen la zona asignada entre quienes a él se dedica;   su clientela está ubicada en San Jacinto, San Juan Nepomuceno,  El Guamo y otros corregimientos de la zona.  Jorge se dedica a este negocio en unión de su esposa y de  esta actividad  su familia conformada por ellos y sus hijos de 8 y 16 años  dependen económicamente de esta actividad.    
Se inició en el negocio vendiendo banano   cuando transportaba este producto en unos camiones desde el Urabá hasta la Costa  Caribe de Colombia, donde conoció los proveedores y decidió emprender un punto de venta   en San Juan Nepomuceno;  luego fue ampliándolo,   buscando nuevos clientes en otros pueblos como en la actualidad lo están haciendo.
Sus ventas son altas debido a que son distribuidores en la zona que tienen asignada; el banano  y el plátano lo venden directamente a los negocios como tiendas,  restaurantes  y  puntos de venta en el mercado. Sus activos totales están representados la mayor parte por el carro y la moto, vehículos,  muy útiles para la distribución de sus productos.  
 Jorge Está aplicando a su primer credikiva, pero su esposa en la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo ha obtenido 6 financiamientos,  que ha inyectado a su capital de trabajo.  En la actualidad con su credikiva comprara plátano directamente,  garantizando mejores precios que trasladará a sus compradores. Su negocio gracias a los financiamientos de la Fundación ha crecido, ahora cuenta con un vehículo repartidor,  cuatro empleados, un cuarto frio y clientes permanentemente.   Su meta más adelante es ampliar su cuarto frio y diversificar su oferta con productos nuevos como verduras, para continuar fortaleciendo el bienestar de su familia, especialmente lograr estudios de calidad para sus hijos. Su mayor desafío es cuando hay cosechas de frutas que disminuyen las ventas, por eso planea incursionar en productos que reemplacen los actuales.
texts.en:
Jorge is a hardworking man who has spent 16 years selling bananas wholesale, which he gets from Urabá Antioqueño.  This is a business that Jorge knows very well and he covers an area that supplies clients in San Jacinto, San Juan Nepomuceno, El Guamo and other parishes within the area.  Jorge works together with his wife on their business and he and his family (his wife and two children ages 8 and 16) are financially dependent on this.

He started out in the banana sales business when he was transporting this produce by lorry from el Urabá to the Caribbean Coast of Colombia, where he got to know the suppliers and decided to establish a sales outlet in San Juan Nepomuceno.  From there he began to expand, looking for new clients in other villages as he is currently still doing.

Their sales are high as they are the distributors for the area assigned to them.  They sell banans directly to businesses such as shops, restaurants and retail outlets in the market.  Their total assets are comprised largely of a car and motorbike, very useful for the distribution of their products.

Jorge is applying for his first Kiva loan, but his wife has received 6 sets of funding from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, which she has invested into their business.  With their Kiva loan they will buy bananas directly, guaranteeing better pries which he will be able to pass on to his customers.  His business has grown thank to funding from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, as he now has a distribution vehicle, four members of staff, a cold room and a fixed client base.  His future target is to expand his cold room and diversify his product line to include new produce such as vegetables so as to continue to better his family's well-being, particularly so as to secure a quality education for his children. His biggest challenge is when there are fruit harvests, which reduces sales and for this reason he plans to dabble in other products that could replace his current produce.

loans.use: to buy bananas directly cutting out the middleman

loans.name: Flor Angela

texts.es: La señora Flor a sus 36 años de edad es madre de dos hijos de 17 y 15 años. Luego de separarse de su esposo quien la dejo sola con la responsabilidad de su hogar y de sus dos hijos, se vio en la necesidad de emprender su propio negocio para conseguir los recursos necesarios para salir adelante con sus hijos. La señora Flor inició con la venta de cremas y obleas, siendo muy organizada, la señora Flor pudo ahorrar y con su propia plata, montar hace tres años una tienda donde vende productos de la canasta familiar. Cuando sus dos hijos salen del colegio la ayudan en la tienda. La señora Flor desea comprar surtido para su tienda con el fin de aumentar sus ingresos y de esta manera poder brindarles a sus dos hijos una buena educación y calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Señora Flor is 36 years old and she has two children aged 17 and 15. After separating from her husband, who left her with the responsibility of looking after their home and their two children, she saw that it was necessary to start her own business in order to come up with the necessary resources to get her children ahead in life.

Señora Flor began by selling creams and wafers.Because she is so organized she was able to save and with her own money she set up a store where she sells basic necessities.

When her two children get out of school they help her in the store. Señora Flor wants to purchase stock for her store, with the goal of increasing her income and consequently, she will be able to provide her children with a good education and quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase stock.

loans.name: Hilda Catalina

texts.es:
Hilda Catalina tiene 51 años de edad vive en unión libre tiene cinco hijos, vive con el esposo y con los hijos de 35, 34, 30, 28 y 25 años de edad en el Cantón ventanas provincia de los ríos.

La VRC ALAS DE CRISTO  se encuentra ubicada en las calles sucre y Ernesto Briones, pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores Comerciales en General.

Hilda se dedica a la venta de bisutería, collares, anillos, cosmeticos, labiales, delineadores desde hace 5 años las compras y las ventas lo realiza en santo Domingo.

Solicita el crédito para comprar mercadería y aumentar el negocio, Con la ayuda del crédito tendría mayor ingreso.

El sueño es poder tener un negocio. No se le ha presentado ningún tipo de problema.

En los tiempos libres le gusta ver televisión.
texts.en:
Hilda Catalina is 51 and lives with her husband and five children, aged 35, 34, 30, 28 and 25.  The live in the district of Ventanas, in Los Rios province. 
The group VRC ALAS de CRISTO is near the corner of Sucre and Ernesto Briones streets, and is engaged in general sales and commerce.
Hilda sells costume jewelry, necklaces, rings, cosmetics, lipstick, eye liners and has been active in sales for 5 years, buying her merchandise in Santo Domingo.  She seeks this credit to buy merchandise and grow her business, in order to increase her income.  Her dream is to own her own business, and she does not have any difficulties at present.  In her spare time, she enjoys watching television.

loans.use: to buy merchandise and expand her sales

loans.name: Maria Dorotea

texts.es: Maria Dorotea, D. 27 años D. edad,ella es una mujer muy luchadora que se ha dedicado a la confeccion D. tejidos tipicos desD. hace 3 años ella nos cuenta que esta muy contenta porque Dios le dio la oportunidad D. este oficio que le a ayudado mucho para ayudar a su familia,ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra D. materia prima para la confeccion D. tejidos,ya que por esta epoca muchas personas compras, e ella los venD. a buen precio.le da gracias a Dios por aberle dado la oportunidad D. conocer tanto esta institucion como Kiva que es una ayuda para las personas que lo nececitan como ella.
texts.en: Maria Dorotea is 27 years old and is a very determined woman who has maD. traditional woven fabric for the last 3 years. She tells us that she is very happy because "God" gave her the opportunity of working in this traD. which has helped her a lot in supporting her family. She is asking for this loan to buy raw materials for making the fabric as at this time of the year a lot of people buy and she sells them at a good price. She gives her :thanks to "God" for having given her the opportunity of learning about an institution such as Kiva which is an aid for people in need like her.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to make traditional woven fabric.

loans.name: Emma

texts.es:
La Sra. Emma pertenece al Banco Comunal “Consuelo”,  del Distrito de San Pablo, Provincia de Bellavista, Departamento de San Martín. Tiene 47 años, es conviviente y tiene 03 hijos, los dos mayores son independientes y el menor de 15 años está a su cargo.

A partir de los 16 años empezó a trabajar y de esa manera buscó apoyar económicamente en casa, esto le permitió contar con independencia económica, a los pocos años se fue a vivir con su pareja, en ese entonces se dedicaban a la agricultura. Años después se mudaron a una casa alquilada, luego de algunos años la compraron, el dueño de dicha casa tenía una bodega que también les traspasó, su esposo le ayudó a establecerla y mejorarla.
Con este nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,700.00 comprará productos para implementar su negocio como: como golosinas, bebidas gaseosas, sacos de arroz y azúcar, cajas de leche, aceites en litros, carnes, verduras, frutas, menestras, casilleros de huevos, pan, conservas  y otros.
La Sra. Emma  es una mujer creativa y emprendedora,  su sueño es contar con un negocio mucho más grande, está muy agradecida con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos por brindar la oportunidad de participar en las sesiones educativas, pues a través de ellas aprende como administrar su dinero.
texts.en: Emma is a member of the communal lender Consuelo,  in San Pablo, Bellavista, San Martín. She is 47, lives with a partner and has three children; tow live independently and she cares for the youngest, who is 15.  Emma has worked since age 16 to support her household, and this has given her economic independence, and she also lived with her partner so they could grow crops.  Later, they moved to a rented house, which they bought some time afterwards.  This house had a small store built-in, and her husband and her began to run and improve it.  With this loan of S/. 1,700.00 she will buy items for the store such as: candy, soft drinks, rice, sugar, boxes of milk, cooking oil, meat, vegetables, fruit, egg cartons, bread, jelly and others.  Emma  is a creative and resourceful woman.  Her dream is to have a much larger business.  She is grateful for the assistance of the group Movimiento Manuela Ramos for their training on financial management.

loans.use: to buy candy, soft drinks, rice, sugar, boxes of milk, cooking oil, etc.

loans.name: Eulalia Alicia

texts.es:
Eulalia Alicia tiene 33 años de edad es soltera tiene dos hijos, vive con los hijos de 14 y 12 años de edad ene l Cantón ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

La VRC ALAS DE CRISTO  se encuentra ubicada en las calles sucre y Ernesto Briones, pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores Comerciales en General.

Eulalia  es costurera  tiene una sastreria desde hace 12 años , las compras de las telas los realiza en Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para poder comprar casimir, hilos, sierres, aumentar el negocio. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá incrementar el negocio.

 El sueño es tener salud y vida no se le ha presentado ningún tipo de problema.

En los tiempos libres le gusta dedicarse a los niños.
texts.en:
Eulalia is 33 and a single mother of two, who are 14 and 12.  They live in Ventanas, los Ríos.  The communal lender VRC Alas de Cristo is on Sucre and Ernesto Briones streets in Ventanas and is active in sales and commerce.  Eulalia  has had a sewing workshop for 12 years, and she buys cloth and material in Ventanas.  She seeks this credit to buy cloth, thread and zippers in order to increase her production and grow her business.
She hopes for good health and enjoys spending her free time with children.

loans.use: to buy clothing material, thread and zippers

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es: Nancy, de 33 años; un ejemplo de madre para sus 3 hijos quienes viven en casa propia asimismo a quienes desea brindarles un buen futuro. Hace 02 años Nancy, abrió una pequeña tienda de venta de ropa a la que ahora se dedica constantemente. Cada mañana se levanta temprano para poder atender a sus hijos y enviarlos al colegio; después abre su negocio en la espera de clientes. Nancy, comenta que las ventas salen los días sábados y domingos ya que vienen de anexos de la localidad de Santa Rosa para hacer sus compras. Ella es conocida por el trato y el buen consejo que les ofrece al elegir una prenda a sus clientes. Lo que más le gusta de trabajo es poder ver a sus clientes muy contentos con las prendas que se llevan y considera que lo más difícil es esperar hasta el fin de semana para tener buenas ventas. Con el crédito solicitado podrá incrementar más prendas de vestir para dejar contentos a sus clientes. Este será su préstamo número 06 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tendrá  el apoyo financiero, ya que así se siente segura de avanzar con su negocio. En su banco comunal es muy alegre y comparte experiencias con sus compañeros. Con el crédito solicitado de 2,000 nuevos soles, podrá comprar ropa como: blusas, polos, pantalones, sí podrá mejorar su negocio.
texts.en:
Nancy, 33, is an exemplary mother for her three children, who live in their own home and to whom she wants to give a good future.  Two years ago Nancy opened a little clothing store in which she now works constantly.  Every morning she gets up early to be able to take care of her children and send them to school; later she opens her store to wait for customers.

Nancy says that the sales come on Saturday and Sunday, since people come to shop from the outskirts of the town of Santa Rosa.  She is known for the treatment and good advice she gives her customers when they are choosing a garment.

What she likes most about her work is being able to see her customers happy with the clothes they take with them.  The most difficult thing is waiting until the weekend to have good sales.

With the requested loan she will be able to increase her articles of clothing to leave her customers happy.  This will be her sixth loan with MFP.  She is very happy to know that she will have the financial help, because in this way she feels secure about moving forward with her business.  She is very happy with her communal bank and she shares experiences with her companions.

With the requested loan of 2,000 PEN, Nancy will be able to buy clothing such as blouses, polo shirts, and pants, so she will be able to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy blouses, polo shirts, and pants.

loans.name: Luisa Marina

texts.es:
Doña Luisa sigue trabajando en limpieza , para el bien comun de la familia, pues es atraves de este esfuerzo que ha venido avanzando, en la mejora de su casa,  su esposo labora en construccion, tambien cuenta  con el apoyo de su hijo que ya trabaja.
Con el credito anterior era para cambio de techo, lo que desvio el credito, y termino muro, que tenia pendiente, devido ah elevados robos en el barrio, y que fue una victima de la delicuencia, robandocele sus electrodomesticos, es por tal razon desea terminar el muro, ya que le falta materiales para cerrarlo todo.
sastifecha al poder reguardar mas su propiedad, con su hermoso muro construido, siendo mas rapido esta mejora con los financiamiento que Afodenic otorga.
texts.en:
Doña Luisa continues to work as a janitor, for the common good of her family, for through this hard work she has been able to move ahead with the improvements to her home.  Her husband works in construction and they also have the support from their son who is also working.
The previous loan was for the replacement of  the roof.  There has been an increase in robberies in the neighborhood of which she was a victim when her electric appliances were stolen.  This has changed her focus to finishing the wall that was pending.  She needs additional materials to be able to enclose it all and be certain that her property is protected by the beautiful wall that has been built.  This improvement can be done more quickly with the help that Afondesic provides.

loans.use: to finish building a wall on her property.

loans.name: Loris Elizabeth

texts.es:
Loris Elizabeth tiene 35 años de edad es  soltera  tiene una hija , vive con la hija de 12 años de edad en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

La VRC ALAS DE CRISTO  se encuentra ubicada en las calles sucre y Ernesto Briones, pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores Comerciales en General.

Loris tiene un local de venta de jugos hace 5 meses y vende tambien ropa. Las compras lo realiza en Guayaquil y las Ventas lo realiza en Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para poder comprar mercadería ropa de damas y caballeros. Con la ayuda del crédito  tendría mayor ingreso.

El sueño es poder tener salud. No se le ha presentado ningún tipo de problema. En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar.
texts.en: Loris Elizabeth is 35, single and has a daughter who is 12.  They live in Ventanas, Los Rios province. The group VRC ALAS de CRISTO  is located at Sucre and Ernesto Briones street in Ventanas, and is active in sales and commerce.  Loris sells juices and clothing and has done so for the past 5 months.  She buys her stock in Guayaquil and las Ventas and sells these items in Ventanas.  She seeks this credit in order to buy an inventory of men's and women's clothing, in order to increase her income.  She hopes for good health and is not facing any difficulties at present.  In her spare time she enjoys relaxing.

loans.use: to buy an inventory of men's and women's clothing

loans.name: La Alternativa 1 & 3 Group

texts.en:
Ruth is just one member of the 10 person group, La Alternativa 1 & 3. This group is located in Samaná, a lush rugged peninsula with a nascent tourism industry. These Dominican entrepreneurs are able to unite in solidarity, allowing them access to funding that they would otherwise never be able to receive on their own. Their businesses are operated from their house or by walking in their community and others nearby. Businesses like beauty salons, clothes and food sales, are some of the principal activities in this group of ten entrepreneurs.

Ruth is a middle-aged woman that lives in Samaná, Dominican Republic. She is a mother of 5 children, and she lives together her long term partner. Ruth has been an Esperanza associate for 6 years and this is her 13th loan with us. She is running a small vending business where she sells cosmetics and beauty products. The earnings from her business will allow her to continue to support her children and put her one step closer to her dream, which is to run an ice cream store and to finish building her house.

loans.use: to buy cosmetic and beauty products to sell

loans.name: Olga

texts.es:
La Sra. Olga pertenece al Banco Comunal “Consuelo”, del  Distrito de San Pablo, Provincia de Bellavista, Departamento de San Martín. Tiene 36 años, está casada y tiene 03 hijos, los dos mayores son independientes, el menor tiene 5 años.
Cuando era joven se dedicaba a trabajar como empleada del hogar. Una de sus cuñadas le dejó un negocio el cual ya no podía administrar, desde entonces Olga se encarga de vender jugos. Se inicia con un capital de 300.00 nuevos soles que le brindó el Movimiento Manuela Ramos. Actualmente no solo vende jugos de frutas, también kekes, sandwich's, arroz chaufa y refrescos de fruta. 
Su esposo  trabaja como chofer en una empresa de transportes.
Con este nuevo préstamo de S/. 2,000.00 nuevos soles, comprará insumos como: variedad de frutas, azúcar por sacos, pollos por kilos, mayonesa, panes, huevos en casilleros, tarros de leche, arroz por sacos y otros. Tiene una vasta clientela que la prefiere por su buena sazón y su amabilidad.
Olga es una mujer luchadora y emprendedora,  su sueño es tener su casa propia e incursionar en la venta de abarrotes, está muy satisfecha  con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos por brindarle la oportunidad a mujeres como ella de crecer económicamente.
texts.en:
Olga belongs to the “Consuelo” communal bank in the San Pablo district, Bellavista province, department of San Martin. She is 36 years old, married and has 3 children. The two oldest are independent and the youngest is 5.  

When she was young, she worked as a domestic employee. One of her sisters in law left her a business she couldn't run anymore, and since then, Olga has sold juice. She started with 300.00 nuevos soles in capital she obtained from the Movimiento Manuela Ramos. At present, she sells cakes, sandwiches, stir fried rice and fruit snacks in addition to juice. 

Her husband works as a driver in a transportation business.

With this new loan of S/. 2,000.00 nuevos soles, she will buy ingredients such as: a variety of fruit, sacks of sugar, kilos of chicken, cartons of eggs, jugs of milk, and more. She has a lot of customers who prefer her good cooking and friendliness. 

Olga is a fighter and and enterprising woman. Her dream is to have her own home and to begin selling groceries. She is very satisfied with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for offering opportunities to woman like her to grow financially.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as: a variety of fruit, sacks of sugar, kilos of chicken, mayonnaise, bread, cartons of eggs, jugs of milk, etc.

loans.name: Henry

texts.es: El señor Henry a sus 23 años de edad, trabaja en una empresa productora de televisión, a la par trabaja para clientes particulares en la edición y grabación de eventos sociales. La experiencia del señor Henry es de 5 años. El señor Henry desea comprar una cámara de video que le ayudará a generar más ingresos y así ayudar a mejorar la calidad de vida de sus padres. A futuro, el señor Henry sueña con tener su propia empresa de producción de televisión y emplear a toda su familia en ella.
texts.en:
Henry, age 23, works for a television production company.  He also works with private customers editing and recording social events.  Henry has five years of experience.

Henry wants to buy a video camera, which will help him generate more income.  That will help to improve his parents’ quality of life.

In the future Henry dreams of having his own television production company.  He dreams of employing his whole family in the company.

loans.use: to buy a video camera.

loans.name: Karina Maria

texts.es:
Karina Maria tiene 38 años de edad vive en unión libre  tiene dos hijos, vive con el esposo y con los hijos de 20 y 15 años de edad en el Cantón Ventanas provincia de los ríos.

La VRC ALAS DE CRISTO  se encuentra ubicada en el Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores Comerciales en General.

Karina se dedica a vender zapatos de damas,caballeros, niñas, niños hace 1 año, las compras y las ventas lo realiza en Guayaquil.

Solicita el crédito para comprar más mercadería de calzado.

Con la ayuda del crédito tendría un beneficio económico.

El sueño es poder tener una casa, no se le ha presentado ningún tipo de problema. En el tiempo libre le gusta realizar quehaceres domésticos.
texts.en:
Karina Maria, age 38, is in a common-law marriage and has two children.  She lives with her husband and her childen; ages 20 and 15.  She lives in the Ventanas Canton, Los Rios province.

The “Alas de Cristo” (Wings of Christ) communal bank is located in the Ventanas Canton.  The members generally devote themselves to commercial work.

Karina has been selling shoes for women, men, and children.  She has been doing this for one year.  She makes her purchases and her sales in Guayaquil.

She is requesting the loan to buy more shoes.  The help of the loan will be economically beneficial.

Her dream is to be able to have a house.  She has not faced any kind of problem.

She likes to do her household chores in her free time.

loans.use: to buy more shoes.

loans.name: Solidario Las Cipresales Group

texts.es: Solidario los Cipresales: este grupo esta integrado por la señora:Doña Maria Isabel,D. 48 años D. edad tiene 5 hijos,ella se dedica a la elavoracion D. tejidos tipicos en telar,desD. hace 8 años nos cuenta que le a ido bien en su negocio,y es por eso que esta solicitando este credito para la compra D. materia prima para la confeccion D. tejidos ya que en esta epoca es cuando mas se venD.,al igual que las siguientes socias esta solicitando este credito para la compra D. materia prima para la confeccion D. tejidos tipicos.
texts.en: Los Cipresales is a group that has Mrs. Maria Isabel as a member.  She is 48 years old, has 5 children and makes a living making typical weaves on a loom.  She has been doing this for 8 years and tells us that her business has been doing well.  For this reaS. she is requesting a loan for the purchase of raw material for the making of these woven fabrics because during this time is when they sell the most.  She is requesting this loan at the same time as the other members are doing so.

loans.use: to purchase raw material for the making of typical woven fabrics.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes, de 52 años de edad,habitante de la ciudad de Leon, casada, de oficio comerciante, dueña de una pulperia. madre de 4 hijos pero actualmente se hace cargo de sus nietos. Orgullosa y contenta encontramos a doña Mercedes quien nos muestra cuanto ha avanzado su negocio gracias al apoyo recibido de kiva con el primer  prestamo , pues ahora ofrece mas mercaderia ha ido edificando su casa poco a poco.Ahora solicita un segundo credito para abastecerse de granos basicos,jugos, gaseosas , sopas , productos enlatados, detergentes, jabones, cosmeticos, pues se acerca la temporada navideña y quiere aprovechar las buenas ventas que se dan durante esta epoca.Siempre esta en sus planes seguir haciendo mejoras su casa  y su  pulperia.
texts.en: Mercedes is 52 years old, resident of the city of Leon, and married.  She is a storekeeper, owner of a general store.  She has 4 children and currently is taking care of her grandchildren.  We find Doña Mercedes proud and happy as she shows us how far her business has come with the support from Kiva and her first loan.  She is now offering more merchandise and has been slowly building her house.  She is now requesting a second loan to stock up on basic grains, juices, sodas, soups, canned products. detergents, soaps, cosmetics, because the Christmas season is approaching and she wants to take advantage of the good sales that occur during this time.  Her plans always include making improvements to her home and her store.

loans.use: buy merchandise such as basic grains, oil, soap, and cleaning products to supply her store with new and improved products.

loans.name: Lucila Hortencia

texts.es:
Lucila Hortencia tiene 57 años de edad vive rçen unión libre tiene cuatro hijos, vive con el esposo y con los hijos de 23, 22, 20 y 17 años de edad en el cantón Ventanas provincia de los ríos.

La VRC ALAS DE CRISTO  se encuentra ubicada en el Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores Comerciales en General.

Lucila se dedica a los quehaceres domésticos y venta de pollos pelados hace 26 años. Las compras y las ventas lo realiza en  Guayaquil. 

Solicita el crédito para comprar gallinas criollas,  con la ayuda del crédito obtendrá un beneficio económico.

En los tiempos libres le gusta realizar quehaceres domésticos.
texts.en:
Lucila Hortencia, age 57, is in a common-law marriage and has four children.  She lives with her husband and their childen; ages 23, 22, 20 and 17.  She lives in the Ventanas Canton, Los Rios province.

The “Alas de Cristo” (Wings of Christ) communal bank is located in the Ventanas Canton.  The members generally devote themselves to commercial work.

Lucila devotes herself to the household chores, and she has been selling plucked chickens for 26 years.  She makes her purchases and her sales in Guayaquil.  

She is requesting the loan to buy chickens.  The help of the loan will be economically beneficial.

She likes to do her household chores in her free time.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Juntos Por Un Mañana Group

texts.es:
Este Banco comunal se llama “Juntos por un mañana” está conformado por 16 emprendedores quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros entre los cuales se encuentran peluquería, preparación de comida rápida, pastelería y venta de ropa nueva. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Rancagua. 
Patricia integrante y delegada del grupo del Banco comunal quien en la foto se encuentra en la última fila, cerca de la ventana, su cabello es rubio y usa anteojos. Se dedica al rubro de la pastelería desde hace dos años, comenta que realizó dos cursos de repostería y lo que comenzó como hobby se convirtió en su trabajo. 
Actualmente prepara sus productos desde su casa, los ofrece y sale a vender a las casa de sus clientes. 
Sus ingredientes los compra en distribuidoras y el mercado, todas las semanas.
Ella trabaja de lunes a sábado en horario flexible y sus clientes le hacen hartos pedidos de tortas, kuchen, pie de limón. 
Con el crédito comprará materiales, específicamente cremas, manjar, huevos, harina, blondas y cajas para decorar.
La meta para su negocio es tener una pastelería.
Patricia vive junto a su marido y sus dos hijas de 18 y 10 años de edad. Sus sueños son seguir trabajando para aumentar sus ingresos y con esto acceder a una mejor calidad de vida para su familia.
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de la oportunidad que le ha brindado Fondo esperanza, ya que le ha permitido invertir en su negocio. También se siente muy cómoda con la acogida que le brindó la institución al participar. Comenta que el grupo del cual forma parte existe mucha confianza, respeto y son muy unidos. 
Rancagua pertenece a la región del Libertador Bernardo O´Higgins. Es una moderna ciudad que regula el principal proceso productivo y exportador agrofrutícola y vitivinícola de Chile. Es también una ciudad minera, debido a que en su cordillera se encuentra la mina subterránea más grande del mundo “El Teniente”, con 4.500 km. de túneles.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called “Together for Tomorrow". It is made up of 16 entrepreneurs who work in different areas, including hair styling, preparing fast food, pastries, and selling new clothes. All of them are from the city of Rancagua. 

Patricia is a member and delegate of the communal bank, who is in the last row in the photo close to the window. Her hair is blond and she uses glasses. She has worked with pastries for two years. She remarks that she has taken cake decorating classes and what was once a hobby has become her work.  
 
At present, she makes her products at home. She offers them and sells them in her customers' houses. She buys her ingredients at distributors and in the market, every week. She works Mondays through Saturdays with a flexible schedule and her customers make many orders for cakes, kuchen, and lemon pie.   

With the loan she will buy materials such as cream, dulce de leche, eggs, flour, paper doilies and boxes for decoration. Her business goals are to have a pastry shop.  

Patricia lives with her husband and two daughters, aged 18 and 10. Her dreams are to keep working and increase her income to have a better quality of life for her family. 

She is very happy and grateful for the opportunity Fondo Esperanza has offered her. This has allowed her to invest in her business. She also feels very comfortable with the opportunity institution has offered her to participate in.  She remarks that with the group she belongs to, there is a lot of trust and respect and they are very close. 

Rancagua belongs to the region of the liberator Bernardo O´Higgins. It is a modern city that regulates the main productive and exportation processing of  Chilean fruit and winery. It is also a mining city, because in its mountains is the largest underground mine in the world, “El Teniente”, with 4.500 km. of tunnels.

loans.use: to buy materials, specifically cream, dulce de leche, eggs, flour, paper doilies and boxes for decorating.

loans.name: Nestor Filomeno

texts.es:
Nestor nació en el departamento de Puno y vive en la ciudad de Urubamba, él tiene 43 años de edad y tiene una relación de libre de la cual tiene un hijo. 
 
Nestor desarrolla sus actividades cotidianas y económicas en la ciudad de Urubamba, él es cirujano dentista pero también tiene un negocio familiar que consiste en la venta de comestible. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. 

Nestor requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar y otras cosas más.  

Nestor se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma. Nestor pertenece al banco comunal “Tercer Milenio” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad de Urubamba.
texts.en:
Nestor was born in the department of Puno and he lives in the city of Urubamba. He is 43 years old and he has a partner with whom he has a son.

Nestor undertakes his daily activities and his work in the city of Urubamba. He is a dental surgeon but he also has a family business which involves selling food. He has been working in this business for several years and it is going very well for him thanks to the effort he puts into his job.

Nestor needs the loan to buy merchandise, such as sacks of rice and sacks of sugar, among other things.

Nestor is grateful for the opportunity that has been provided to him and he therefore promises to make his repayments according to schedule. Nestor belongs to the communal bank “Tercer Milenio” [Third Millennium] from the Arariwa Association in the city of Urubamba.

loans.use: to buy merchandise, such as sacks of rice and sacks of sugar, among other things.

loans.name: Mercy Cecilia

texts.es:
Mercy es una mujer de 22 años de edad muy trabajadora y responsable. Vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos en Ambato que está ubicado en la Sierra Centro de Ecuador.

Mercy trabaja con su familia en la cocecha de productos agrícolas como: cebolla, papas, fréjol, maíz entre otros. Es el cuarto crédito que solicita a Fodemi, el mismo que va a ser utilizado en la compra de fungicidas producto químico que ayudará a que la cocecha no sea invadida por insectos y crezca bien y sea de buena calidad al momento de la cocecha, esta inversión ayuda a Mercy a proteger su sembrío y a obtener buenos ingresos ya que obtendrá productos de buena calidad y así podrá mantener a su familia, quiere seguir creciendo económicamente.
texts.en:
Mercy is a very hard-working and responsable 22 year old woman. She lives with her husband and her two children in Ambato, which is located in the center of Ecuador.

Mercy works with her family, harvesting agricultural products such as: onions, potatoes, beans and corn among other items. This is the fourth loan she has requested from Fodemi and it will be used to buy fungicides which are chemical products that will help to ensure that the harvest will not be attacked by insects, that it grows well and that it is of good quality at the time of harvesting. This investment helps Mercy to protect her crops and to earn a good income as the result will be good quality products, which means she will be able to support her family. She wants to continue her economic development.

loans.use: to buy fungicides so that the harvest does not get damaged.

loans.name: Rosadina

texts.es:
Rosadina tiene 46 años, es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos.  Cuenta con casa propia, la cual queda ubicada en Oyotún, ubicada a 2 horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital del departamento de Lambayeque.  Rosadina y su familia son muy estimados por sus vecinos, quienes han dado buenas referencias personales.

Rosadina se dedica a la venta de tamales (plato típico de algunas regiones de Sudamérica preparado en base a una pasta de maíz rellena de carne, verduras y otras especias) desde hace 3 años.  Este producto es bastante consumido por los pobladores de la zona.  Rosadina por su amabilidad y buena atención a sus clientes es muy estimada y siempre la buscan para comprar sus productos. Con los ingresos que percibe puede solventar sus gastos y los de su familia.

Rosadina desea adquirir algunos insumos y materiales como ollas hacer crecer a su negocio.  Por ello ha decidido solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 500 nuevos soles.

Ella es una mujer bastante tranquila y responsable. Las personas que le conocen le consideran alguien honrada y de confianza.
texts.en:
Rosadina is 46 years old and she has a partner and 3 children. She owns her own house which is located in Oyotún, 2 hours from the city of Chiclayo which is the capital of the department of Lambayeque. Rosadina and her family are well respected by their neighbors, who have given them good personal references.

Rosadina has sold tamales (a typical dish from some South American regions, which is made up of corn pasta stuffed with meat, vegetables and spices) for the past 3 years. This food is often eaten by the people in her area. Because of her kindness and good customer service, Rosadina is very respected and is always sought after by customers who want to buy her products. With the income that she earns, she can settle her bills and those of her family.

Rosadina wants to purchase some ingredients and equipment like pots to help her business to grow. Therefore, she has decided to request a loan of 500 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

She is a responsible and rather quiet woman. The people who know her consider her to be honest and trustworthy.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and materials, to increase her business of selling tamales.

loans.name: Mirna Maribel

texts.es:
La Sra. Mirna Maribel pertenece al Banco Comunal “Los Claveles”, D. Distrito de Picota, Provincia de  Picota, Departamento de San Martín. Tiene 37 años, es conviviente y tiene 03 hijos, la mayor de 20 años está casada, los 2 pequeños tienen 9 y 14 años.
Desde muy joven se dedicaba a trabajar como empleada D. hogar. Cuando se va a vivir con su pareja se dedican a la crianza de porcino, lee iba muy bien en este negocio pero hace dos años los porcinos enfermaron y murieron.  recibió un préstamo D. Movimiento Manuela Ramos de 300.00 nuevos soles con el cual se inicia en el negoico de venta de comida de la región como: asados, caldo de gallina, pescado en hoja , cabeza de chancho asado, juanes ,arroz chaufa y refrescos, esta actividad la realiza en las afueras D. mercado de su localidad a partir de las 5:00pm hasta la 1:00 am, su esposo le ayuda los días que tiene libre ya que trabaja como chofer eventualmente.
Con este préstamo de S/. 1,500.00,  comprará ingredientes como: un saco de arroz, pollos por kilos, un saco de papa, gallinas, pescado por kilo, ingredientes  para sazonar, carbón para asar sus  parrillas y frutas regionales  para así captar nuevos clientes y mantener satisfechos a sus clientes actuales, pues su negocio está bien ubicado.
Mirna Maribel  es una mujer luchadora y emprendedora, lucha para sacar adelante a su familia,  su sueño es contar con un negocio que vaya creciendo y que sus hijos sean profesionales; está muy agradecida con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos por confiar en ella.
texts.en:
Mirna Maribel belongs to "Los Claveles" Community Bank in the district and province of Picota, in the department of San Martin. She is 37 years old, lives with her spouse and has three children. The eldest, 20, is married. The two smalller ones are 9 and 14 years old.

Since she was very young she has been dedicated to working as a housekeeper. When she went to live with her spouse, they were dedicated to raising hogs. This business was going well but two years ago the hogs became sick and died. She received a 300 "soles" loan from the Manuela Ramos Movement  with which she began the business selling regional food such as roasts, chicken broth, fish in foil, roasted pork head, "juanes", Peruvian fried rice, and refreshments. She does this work outside her area's market from 5PM until 1AM. Her husband helps her on the days he has free since he works as a driver. With this loan of S 1,500, she will buy ingredients like a sack of rice, chicken by the kilo, a sack of potatoes, hen, fish by the kilo, seasonings, charcoal for her grills and regional fruits in order to capture new customers and keep her current customers satisfied since her business is well located.

Mirna Miribel is a hard-working and entrepreneurial woman. She fights to get her family ahead. Her dream is to have a business that is growing and that her children become professionals. She is very thankful for the Manuela Ramos Movement for trusting her.

loans.use: to purchase inputs and ingredients like rice, chicken, etc.

loans.name: Jose Jaime

texts.es: El señor José a sus 48 años de edad se dedica hace 15 años a la venta de jugos naturales de naranja en una esquina a una cuadra del parque del municipio de Bello ubicado al norte de Antioquia. El señor José abre su negocio todos los días desde las 5:00 a.m. hasta las 2:00 p.m. El señor José desea comprar surtido de naranjas y una licuadora con lo cual pueda seguir ayudando en los gastos de su casa donde vive con su mamá y una hermana, a la vez que pueda mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Mr. José is 48 years old and has been selling natural orange juice for 15 years on a corner of the municipal park in Bello, located north of Antioquia.  He opens every day at 5:00 a.m. and works until 2:00 p.m.  José wants to buy oranges in bulk and a blender so he can continue his business and help cover household expenses.  He lives with his mother and a sister and wants to improve his family's lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy oranges in bulk and a blender.

loans.name: Roberto Santiago

texts.es:
Roberto Santiago tiene 45 años de edad vive en unión libre tiene 4 hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos de 9, 7, 4 y cuatro meses de edad en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

La VRC ALAS DE CRISTO  se encuentra ubicada en las calles sucre y Ernesto Briones, pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores Comerciales en General.

Roberto se dedica a realizar conecciones eléctricas hace 15 años, las compras de los materiales que necesita lo realiza en los almacenes eléctricos y las instalaciones lo realiza donde le pidan. 

Solicita el crédito para comprar materiales para poder realizar las instalaciones.

Con la ayuda del crédito obtendría un beneficio económico. El sueño es poder comprar unas bóvedas en el cementerio.

 No se le han presentado ningún tipo de inconveniente.En los tiempos libres le gusta realizar trabajos.
texts.en:
Roberto Santiago is 45 years old and lives with his common-law wife and four children, ages nine, seven, four, and four months.  They live in the Ventanas Canton in the province of Los Ríos.

The communal bank ALAS DE CRISTO is located on Sucre and Ernesto Briones Streets and belongs to the Ventanas Canton.  In general, the members are merchants.

Roberto has been in business installing electrical wiring for 15 years.  He buys the supplies he needs at the electric materials warehouses and carries out installations where asked to do so.

He is requesting a loan to buy materials to do his job.  The loan will benefit his economic situation.  His dream is to buy a mausoleum in the cemetary.  He has not run into any inconveniences.  In his free time he enjoys doing what he does at work.

loans.use: To buy materials for work.

loans.name: Felipa Isabel

texts.es:
La señora es casada, de 25 años de edad, estudio la primaria, tiene 1 hijo el cual no estudian aun, se dedica a la tejeduría, y ahora quiere construir un vivero para verduras, lleva 7 años de experiencia en el trabajo de tejeduría.

Solicita un prestamos que lo utilizará para la  construcción de un vivero para verduras, específicamente para tomate, ya que sueña tener un gran vivero y producir frutas y verduras.
texts.en:
The lady is married and 25 years old.  She has an elementary school education. She has a son who is not in school yet.  She makes a living in weaving and is now wanting to build a garden for vegetables.  She has been in weaving for 7 years.

She is requesting this loan which she will use to build a bed for vegetables, especially tomatoes.  She wants to have a large garden and produce fruits and vegetables.

loans.use: to build a bed for vegetables.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.es:
Marcelina tiene 42 años de edad,  es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos, Vive en casa propia, la cual está ubicada en el Caserío Jesús del Valle, un Distrito de Tambogrande, que corresponde a la Región Piura a 4 horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital del Departamento de Lambayeque. 

La actividad que desarrolla Marcelina es la ganadería contando con 15 ovinos, los cuales cría y engorda para luego comercializarlos en el mercado local.  Además trabaja en la parcela que su padre le ha dado como herencia donde tiene limón en producción que cosecha semanalmente, su esposa lo apoya en las actividades que realiza, existe una buena relación familiar.  Con estos ingresos pueden solventar los gastos de la familia.

Marcelina desea comprar alimento balanceado para el engorde de ovinos y realizar mejoras en el corral de los ovinos para que logren un mejor peso y tamaño y así poderlos vender a un mejor precio en el mercado, esta inversión le permitirá seguir creciendo en su negocio y así mejorar su calidad de vida.  Es por ello que para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente obtener un crédito de 700 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Marcelina, 42, lives with her common-law husband and four children.  They have their own house in the Jesús del Valle rural community in the district of Tambogrande.  This is in the Piura Region, about four hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque Department.

Marcelina raises livestock and has 15 sheep which she will fatten so she can sell them at the local market.  She also works on a patch of land inherited from her father where she grows lemons and harvests weekly.  Her husband helps her with her activities and the family gets along well.  With the income they generate they are able to cover household expenses.

Marcelina wants to buy balanced animal feed for the sheep and make some improvements to the sheep corrals so they can reach optimum weight and size.  This will allow her to sell them at the best market price.  This investment will help her continue to grow the business and improve her quality of life.  For this purpose she has requested a loan in the amount of 700 PEN through Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: To buy balanced animal feed and improve corrals.

loans.name: Ramón Antonio

texts.es:
Don Ramon labora como guarda de seguridad, pues ha mantenido su trabajo, y gracias a estos tambien su vida familiar ha mejorado al poder dar mejores comodidad de vivienda.
Hoy con este nuevo prestamo sera para hacer divisiones de cuarto,comprara materiales de construccion y comenzar la obra, dando a sus hijos, seguridad y privacidad, ya que no cuenta con esta mejora que es de relevancia para todos. El cual el va poco ah poco haciendo posible esto, ya que son muchos gastos que cubrir, y que tiene que cumplir y mejorar como padre responsable de la familia.
texts.en:
Don Ramon works as a security guard.  He has kept his job and thanks to this his family life has improved as he is able to make improvements to his residence.
This new loan is for making dividers for the rooms.  He will buy construction materials and will begin the work which will give more security and privacy for his children.  He does not currently have the privacy that is important to everyone.  He is slowly making this possible, the expenses and improvements that he has to cover as a responsible father of a family are many.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to build room dividers providing more privacy for his family.

loans.name: Ruth Elvira

texts.es: Ruth Elvira,20 años de edad ella se dedica a la venta de flores desde  hace 5 años,ella nos cuenta que esta muy contenta porque,gracias a Dios tiene mucha demanda en sus ventas,es por eso que esta solicitando este credito´para la compra de flore,de distintas clases,ya que en esta espoca es cuando mas se venden,y quiere aprovechar esta oportunidad para incrementar sus ganacias,espera que kiva a travez de fape le pueda ayudar con el credito ya que es una institucion que se a caracterisado por ayudar a las personas,atravez de los creditos.
texts.en: Ruth Elvira, 20 years old, has been selling flowers for the last 5 years.  She tells us that she is very happy because thanks to God she has much demand.  For this reason she is requesting a loan to buy flowers of various kinds.  This is the time when she sells the most and she wants to take advantage of the opportunity to increase her income.  She hopes that Kiva through FAPE will be able to help her with this loan, since this is an institution that is known for its support to people through loans.

loans.use: to buy flowers for resale.

loans.name: Aquiles Oswaldo

texts.es:
Aquiles Oswaldo tiene 25 años de edad vive en unión libre tiene un hijo, vive con la esposa  y con el hijo de 1 año de edad en el Cantón Ventanas provincia de los ríos.

La VRC ALAS DE CRISTO  se encuentra ubicada en las calles sucre y Ernesto Briones, pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores Comerciales en General.

Aquiles  se dedica a la agricultura y a la venta de ropa desde hace 6 años , las compras y las ventas lo realiza en Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para comprar mercadería, ropa para hombres y mujeres de toda edad.

Con la ayuda del préstamo obtendrá  beneficios económicos.
El sueño es comprarse un carro, no se le ha presentado ningún problema , en los tiempos libres le gusta ver televisión.
texts.en:
Aquiles Oswaldo is 25 years old and lives with his common-law wife and one-year-old son in the Ventanas Canton in the province of Los Ríos.

The communal bank ALAS DE CRISTO is located on Sucre and Ernesto Briones Streets in the Ventanas Canton.  In general, the members are merchants.

Aquiles is a farmer and also has been selling clothing for six years.  He buys and sells his goods in Ventanas and is requesting a loan to buy men's and women's clothing, for all ages.  With the help of the loan he will be able to make a good profit.  

His dream is to buy a car.  He has not run into any problemas and enjoys watching television in his free time.

loans.use: To buy men's and women's clothing.

loans.name: Las Vecinas (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Las Vecinas, está formado por 8 socias y 1 socio quienes trabajan en diferentes actividades, las mismas que le permiten solventar los gastos del hogar y así salir adelante con su familia. Viven en diferentes lugares de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es patrimonio cultural de la humanidad desde 1999, su mezcla entre lo colonial y lo moderno la hacen una ciudad muy bella, su gente mantienen la cultura y tradiciones, son personas muy cálidas y amables.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Mercedes, tiene 40 años y es casada. Su esposo es de profesión mecánico automotriz y labora en su propio taller, la casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.
 
Ella labora como empleada privada hace 3 años y trabaja de martes a sábados todo el día, en sus tiempos libres se dedica a la venta de cosméticos de varias marcas.
 
Este es su primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal al cual fue invitada por una amiga, su primer crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de perfumes, cremas y cosméticos para tener más variedad para sus clientes.
 
Su meta es tener un negocio propio como un bazar.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Las Vecinas" is comprised of nine members who all work in different activities which allow them to cover household expenses and help their families get ahead.  They live in different parts of the city of Cuenca.  This city has been a World Heritage site since 1999.  Its mix of colonial and modern make it a beautiful city.  The local people maintain their culture and traditions and are very warm-hearted and kind.

One of the members of the group is Mrs. Mercedes.  She is 40 years old and married.  Her husband is an auto mechanic and has his own workshop.  They live in their own house.

She has been a domestic employee for three years, working Tuesday through Saturday, all day.  In her free time she sells different brands of cosmetics.

This is her first loan through the communal bank which she was invited to join by a friend of hers.  She plans to use the loan to buy perfumes, creams and cosmetics so she will have more variety to offer customers.

Her goal is to have her own business, something like a bazaar.

loans.use: To buy perfumes, creams and cosmetics.

loans.name: La Alternativa 4 & 5 Group

texts.en:
Alida is one member of the 10 person group, La Alternativa 4 & 5. Her group is located in Samana, a lush rugged peninsula with a nascent tourism industry. Alida, like all in this group, decided to do business with Esperanza because she needed to bring extra income to her house.

Alida is a divorced mother of 3 children. She is running a sales business where she sells different products like cosmetics, shoes, accessories, and clothing. Alida started her business with her first loan from Esperanza, and this activity allows her to support her family. With this loan, she will invest in her business by buying more of those products. Her future plans are to have a wholesale store, to have enough money to give her children all their needs, and to pay for their degree studies.

This Esperanza associate began with us around 6 years ago, and this is her 13th loan. All previous loans have been re-paid and invested in her business. She thanks all of you for your support!

loans.use: to buy products like cosmetics, shoes, etc. to sell

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es: Victoria, de 38 años convive con Auron de 37 años; viven en casa propia junto a sus 04 hijos a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Victoria, es una mujer a quien le gusta trabajar arduamente, ella  junto a su pareja se dedican a la elaboración de ladrillo, quienes desde muy temprano se levantan para poder empezar con su trabajo de labrar tierra y producir ladrillo. Lo que mas le gusta de su trabajo es que lo hacen con mucho esfuerzo y alegría, lleva 10 años realizando esta actividad y considera difícil estar de pie labrando y horneando los ladrillos. Con el tiempo desean comprar tierras para poder hacer más ladrillos y así vender y entregar conforme a los pedidos que le hacen sus clientes.  Este será su préstamo número 12 con MFP y se siente contenta ya que puede concretar con su trabajo, por otro lado esta dispuesta a seguir pagando puntualmente con sus cuotas. En su banco comunal se siente tranquila de trabajar con personas responsables. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, comprará más tierras para poder realizar sus ladrillos ya que es la manera de sustentar a su familia.
texts.en: Victoria, 38, lives with Auron, 37. They live in their own house along with their four children to whom they wish to provide a better quality of life. Victoria is a woman who likes to work hard. She, along with her partner, are dedicated to making bricks. They get  up very early in order to be able to begin their work tilling land and making bricks. What she likes most about her work is that they do it with a lot of effort and happiness. She has ten years experience with this activity and she considers it difficult to be standing working and baking the bricks. With time, they wish to buy land to be able to make more bricks and sell and deliver the orders that their customers make. This will be the 12th loan with MFP and she feels happy since she can arrange her work. On the other hand she is willing to continue paying her payments on time. In her community bank, she feels at ease to work with responsible people. With the 1,000 soles, she will buy more land to be able to make her bricks since it is the way she supports her family.

loans.use: to purchase more land especially for making bricks.

loans.name: Rafaela

texts.es: Rafaela. D. 38 años D. edad tiene 1 hijo,es una persona que se a caracterisado por ser luchadora para salir adelante cada dia,y tener nuevas oportunidades para su familia y para ella,ella se dedica a la venta D. flores desD. hace 18 años,es por eso que esta solicitando este credito para la compra D. flores ya que en esta oportunidad D. fin D. año es cuando mas se venD.,ella nos cuenta  que esta es una buena oportunidad D. incrementar sus ventas como tambien su ganancias,espera que se le pueda apoyar con el credito solicitado.
texts.en: Rafaela is 38 years old and has one son.  She is a person that is noted for being a go-getter in order to get ahead every day and proviD. new opportunities for herself and her family.  She has been selling flowers for 18 years.  She is requesting a loan for the purchase of flowers for resale, because at the end of the years is when they sell the most.  She tells us that this is a good opportunity to increase her sales and also her income.  She hopes that she will get the support through the requested loan.

loans.use: to buy flowers for resale.

loans.name: Rodrigo De Jesus

texts.es: El señor Rodrigo a sus 69 años de edad, se dedica desde hace 18 años en su propio negocio a la fabricación y reparación de calzado. La jornada laboral del señor Rodrigo es de todos los días desde las 9:00 a.m. hasta las 6:00 p.m. Este oficio lo aprendió desde muy joven, gracias a un vecino quien lo empleo en su taller de reparación de calzado.  El señor Rodrigo desea comprar materia prima como pega, suelas, tinturas, entre otros productos para fabricar y reparar zapatos. Con lo anterior podrá aumentar su calidad de vida y de la su familia. El sueño del señor Rodrigo es poder adquirir su vehículo propio.
texts.en: Rodrigo, at 69 years of age, has been dedicated since he was 18 years old to his own business making and repairing shoes. Rodrigo's working day every day is from 9AM until 6PM. He learned this job when he was young, thanks to a neighbor who employed him in his shoe repair shop. Rodrigo wishes to buy raw materials such as paste, soles, dyes, among other products to make and repair shoes. With the above, he will be able to improve his and his family's quality of life. Rodrigo's dream is to be able to acquire his own vehicle.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials like paste, soles and dyes.

loans.name: Romel Isidro

texts.es:
Don Romel sigue laborando en una farmacia en bodega, el cual junto a su esposa, se esfuerzan para el mejoramiento de su casa,  ella trabaja como dependienta, y ambos apoyan  a sus hijos.
Romel construira el baño y el servicio higienico, comprando materiales en tuvo, pega, para las aguas negras  asi como el  inodoro, bloques, cemento, hierro, logrando mejor higiene, al poder gozar de esta mejora.
Todo esta caro, pero con los financiamiento, se hace mas posible el poder avanzar con la construccion. Que es su prioridad a futuro.
texts.en:
Don Romel continues working as a pharmaceutical shopkeeper and, together with his wife, works hard to carry out home improvements.  She works as a shop clerk and both of them support their children.  Romel plans to build a bathroom and install hygienic services, so he needs to buy materials such as pipes, cement, a toilet, blocks, and iron to improve hygiene and enjoy a better environment.

Everything is expensive but with the loan he can continue his project since it is his priority for the future.

loans.use: To build a bathroom and install a toilet.

loans.name: Cristobal

texts.es:
Cristobal  vive y trabaja en famous Nazca, or Nasca, Perú. The city is well known for the legendary Nazca Lines-a series of ancient, immense and inexplicable geoglyphs etched into the desert surrounding the city, generally attributed to the Nazca culture, which inhabited in the region from 300-800 AD. As such, the city attracts a considerable amount of tourism. But Nazca is also known for its hardworking people, who have preserved despite frequent earthquakes, tsunamis, and a high level of poverty in the region.
Cristobal es un hombre casado de 29 años de edad, tiene 1 hijo menor de edad, el se dedica a la venta de abarrotes y frutas eligió este tipo de trabajo porque le permite estar mas tiempo con su familia.  Cristobal es un hombre trabajador, honesto y muy luchador con muchas ganas de sacar adelante a su familia, el empezó en el negocio desde el año 2009 gana semanalmente S/. 230 soles, con el préstamo de S/. 1000 soles que recibirá gracias a Kiva lo invertirá para darle mantenimiento  a su casa ( ponerle piso falso y para que pueda construir un cuarto) uno de sus sueños es terminar de construir su casa y ampliar su tienda para que le pueda dar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia su asesor cree que es un buen cliente.
texts.en:
Cristobal  lives and works in famous Nazca, or Nasca, Perú. The city is well known for the legendary Nazca Lines- a series of ancient, immense and inexplicable geoglyphs etched into the desert surrounding the city, generally attributed to the Nazca culture, which inhabited in the region from 300-800 AD. As such, the city attracts a considerable amount of tourism. But Nazca is also known for its hardworking people, who have preserved the culture despite frequent earthquakes, tsunamis, and a high level of poverty in the region.

Cristobal is 29 years old, married and has a small son.  He sells groceries and fruits and chose this business because it allows him to spend more time with his family.  He is a hard-working, honest man who is very intent on helping his family get ahead.  He started his business in 2009 and earns 230 PEN a week.  With the 1,000 PEN loan he receives from Kiva, he plans to expand his house (building a second level and bedroom).  One of his goals is to finish his house and expanding his store so he can provide his family with a better lifetyle.  He he considered to be a good borrower.

loans.use: To expand her house by adding second level and building a bedroom.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: Maria,de 40 años de edad,es una persona que es muy conocida por su venta y por su umildad conque trata a sus clientes,ella se dedica a la compra y venta de flores desde hace 18 años,nos cuenta que es una actividad que le a ayudado mucho en lo economico,ya que tiene que darles apoyo a sus hijos para  que dia a dia salgan adelante y tengan nuevas oportunidades,es por eso que esta solicitando este credito para la compra de flores,ya que nececita mas capital para comprar mas flores y asi de la misma manera aumentar su ganacia.
texts.en: Maria, 40, is well-known for her sales and kindness when interacting with customers.  For 18 years she has been buying and selling flowers and says this business has helped her economically.  She must support her children so they can get ahead and have new opportunities.  She is requesting a loan to buy flowers since she needs more capital to do so.  This will enable her to increase her earnings.

loans.use: To buy and sell flowers.

loans.name: Ariel Antonio

texts.es:
Ariel, de 27 años de edad, casado, originario de la ciudad de León, de oficio comerciante el vende leche y alquila sillas y mesas para eventos. Inicio con este negocio hace 5 años cuando tenia 22 años lo heredo de su papa que era comerciante. Este ha sido su primer  negocio donde actualmente tiene un trabajador quien le ayuda a repartir la leche mientras el busca vender en otras zonas y también ofreciendo el alquiler de sillas y mesas plástica para eventos. 
El requiere el préstamo para comprar recipientes de almacenamiento de leche e invertir en mantenimiento vehicular de su camioneta que utiliza para transportar y vender la leche. Pues con esta inversión podrá un mejor mantenimiento vehicular a su camioneta para que funcione en mejores condiciones además de tener recipientes nuevos para mantener fresca su leche. El desea comprar un freezer para vender queso, leche helada y en lo futuro ahorrar para comprar una camioneta para trabajo.
texts.en:
Ariel, 27, is married and lives in the city of León.  He works as a milk merchant and also rents tables and chairs for events.  He began this business five years ago when he was 22 and inherited it from his father who was a merchant.  This is his first business and he has one hired worker who helps deliver the milk while Ariel looks for business in other areas.  He also offers his plastic tables and chairs for events.

He needs a loan to buy milk storage cans and to provide maintenance for the truck he uses to deliver and sell the milk.  This investment will allow him to keep his truck in optimum working conditions and the milk cans will keep the milk fresh.  He hopes to buy a freezer so he can sell cheese and cold milk.  In the future he plans to buy another truck for work.

loans.use: To buy milk cans and provide truck maintenance.

loans.name: Erma Amalia

texts.es:
La Sra. Erma Amalia pertenece al Banco Comunal “Los Claveles”, del Distrito Picota, Provincia de Picota, Departamento de San Martín. Es conviviente, tiene 22  años, tiene dos hijas una de 7 años que cursa el primer año de primaria y la segunda de 2 años. 
Hace  tres años inició su negocio de venta de DVDs(Discos con películas) con un capital de S/ 300.00 nuevos soles que le brindó el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, negocio que acondicionó en su propia casa a la que acuden diariamente sus clientes. Su esposole ayuda mucho, él sale a vender a los diferentes pueblitos mientras ella vende en casa.
Con este nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,700.00, comprara DVDs al por mayor, igualmente tiene pensado comprar ropa para damas y caballeros  para ofrecer a sus clientes que asisten a su negocio y de esa manera generar otros ingresos.
Erma Amalia se considera una mujer muy trabajadora, es por ello que desea crecer, está muy agradecida con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos por ayudar a mujeres como ella a tener oportunidades de desarrollarse en el medio donde se desenvuelven.
texts.en:
Erma Amalia belongs to the "Los Claveles" Community Bank of the Picota district and province, San Martin province. She lives with her partner, is 22 years old and has two daughters. One is 7 years old and is a first year student at the primary school. The second is two years old.

Three years ago she began her business selling DVDs (film discs) with capital of S 300 which the Manuela Ramos Movement provided her. It was a business that she created in her own house and attended to customers daily. Her husband helps her a lot. He goes out to sell to different towns while she sells from home.

With this new loan of S. 1,700, she will buy DVDs at wholesale. At the same time, she is thinking of buying women's and men's clothing to offer to her customers that will help her business and, in this manner, generate more income.

Erma Amalia is considered a very hard-working woman. It is because of this that she wishes to grow. She is very thankful to Manuela Ramos Movement for helping women like her to have opportunities to develop themselves in the environment where the operate.

loans.use: to purchase DVDs at wholesale.

loans.name: Karla Patricia

texts.es:
La señora Karla tiene 25 años de edad y vive en el municipio de Choloma. Ella es madre soltera y tiene dos hijos de 6 y 2 años de edad. El mayor asiste a la escuela. Karla y sus hijos viven con la madre de Karla. 

Karla especializa en la elaboración de donas. Inició el negocio en octubre del año 2010 para sacar a su familia adelante. La madre de Karla le ayuda hacer las donas y el negocio tiene dos vendedores que se encarguen de vender las donas de forma ambulante. Karla también las vende en la maquila donde trabaja. Su horario es uno de “4x4” donde trabaja 4 días y luego tiene 4 días libre. Cuando no esté en la maquila, ella se dedica a su negocio. 

Solicitó este crédito de L10,000 para la compra de materia prima para la elaboración de las donas (harina, azúcar, leche y sal entre otras cosas). Su sueño es llegar a tener su casa propia y que sus hijos se gradúen.
texts.en:
Señora Karla is 25 years old and lives in the town of Choloma.  She is a single mother with two children aged 6 and 2.  The older one is in school.  Karla and her children live with Karla's mother.

Karla specializes in making doughnuts.  She started her business in October 2010, in order to move her family ahead in life.  Karla's mother helps her make the doughnuts, and the business has two salespeople who are responsible for selling the doughnuts as street vendors.  Karla also sells them in the factory where she works.  Her schedules is what's known as "4x4", where she works for 4 days, and then has 4 days off.  When she isn't in the factory, she works in her business.

She requested this loan of L10,000 for the purchase of raw ingredients for making the doughnuts (flour, sugar, milk, salt, among other things).  Her dream is to be able to have her own home, and for her children to graduate.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials for making doughnuts, such as flour, sugar, milk and salt.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase chickens, plus care and housing construction for the chickens.

loans.name: Jose Efrain

texts.es:
El señor Jose Efrain  es casado, tiene 30 años de edad, estudio la educación primaria, tiene 2 hijos los cuales no estudian, se dedica a la tejeduría, inició este negocio como operador, y hasta el momento lleva 4 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quien de dedica al mismo oficio de tejeduría.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de materia prima consistente en hilos de diferentes clases y colores. Espera en el futuro contar con colaboradores.
texts.en:
Mr. Jose Efrain, 30, is married and has a primary education.  His two children are not in school yet.  He is a weaver and began the business as an operator.  He has four years of experience and counts on his wife for support since she also weaves.

He is requesting a loan to buy raw materials consisting of different colored and types of yarn.  He hopes to have more workers in the future.

loans.use: To buy yarn for weaving.

loans.name: Nueva Unión (Portoviejo) Group

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal La Nueva Unión se reúne cada quince días en el cantón Junín (Portoviejo), este lugar se lo conoce por su gente amable y trabajadora y porque en este lugar se destila el mejor aguardiente de la provincia y  del Ecuador.

Este es un grupo de 10 socias y 2 socios  que decidieron unirse y formar este Banco Comunal que les sirve de mucho ya que con los créditos, ellos pueden mejorar sus pequeños negocios que tienen o empezar en el mundo del comercio. Se dedican a diversas actividades tales como comercio, servicios, venta de comidas entre otras actividades.

Aquí vive la Johanna, tiene  27 años y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos de 8, 5 y 2 años de edad, los dos mayores estudian en escuela. El marido trabaja en Quito.
 
Ella es una joven madre muy responsable y trabajadora que quiere lo mejor para el futuro de sus hijos, con este crédito ella va a empezar un negocio de venta de ropa de todo tipo, se va a trasladar hacia quito donde trabaja su esposo y traer mercadería para aprovechar la época de Navidad y Año Nuevo que es cuando más ropa compra la gente, quiere traer sobretodo ropa para niños ya que es lo que más se vende en estos días.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar pantalones, blusas, camisetas, ropa de niños y bisutería. Este es su primer ciclo en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la rapidez conseguir los créditos.
 
Sus sueños son que su negocio prospere y  darles lo mejor a sus hijos.

En la fotografía podemos apreciar una foto pequeña adjunta que pertenece a un socio que por motivos laborales no pudo estar presente cuando se tomó la foto grupal. Tambien en la parte izquierda de la foto está una Señora sentada en una banca con camiseta roja, esta Señora no pertenece al grupo.
texts.en:
The Nueva Unión Community Bank meets every 15 days in Junín (Portoviejo). This place is known for its friendly and hard-working people and because in this place the best brandy of the province and of Ecuador is distilled here.

This is a group of ten female members and two male members who decided to unite and form this community bank that has served them a lot since with the loans, they have been able to improve their small business or make a start in the world of commerce. They are dedicated to different work such as commerce, service, selling food, among other activities.

Johanna lives here. She is 27 years old and maintains a relationship from which she has three children who are 8,5, and two years old. The two eldest study at school. Her spouse works in Quito.

She is a very responsible and hard-working young mother who wants the best for the future of her children. With this loan she is going to start a business selling all types of clothing. She is going to move near Quito where her husband works and to bring merchandise in order to take advantage of the Christmas and New Year holiday which is when people buy more clothing. She wants to bring, above all, children's clothing since it is what she sells most on those days.

This loan is going to be used to buy trousers, blouses, shirts, children's clothing and jewelry. This is her first cycle with the community bank and she likes it for its speed to acquire a loan.
 
Her dreams are that her business prospers and to give her children the best.

In the photograph, we can see a small photo that belongs to a member who, due to job reasons, was not able to be present when they took the group photo. Also, in the left part of the photo is a woman who is seated on a bank with a red shirt. This woman does not belong to the group.

loans.use: to purchase trousers, blouses, shirts, children's clothing and jewelry.

loans.name: Hortencia
